The friendly hosts of the Seagull will be happy to assist guests with sightseeing information, excursions and car rental.​

Poi.Name: Sevi Apartments
Poi.Description:
​

Sevi Apartments is set amidst a well-tended garden, just 150 metres from Kamari Beach. It features self-catered accommodation and free Wi-Fi in public areas. A tavern serving local dishes and a supermarket are at 100 metres.

Simply yet tastefully decorated, all apartments consist of one separate bedroom and a kitchenette with a fridge, 2 cooking rings, kettle and toaster. They are bright and open to a balcony with garden, mountain or Aegean Sea view. Ironing facilities and a hairdryer are included.

Sevi Apartments lies 17 km from Hippocrates International Airport and 42 km from the main town and port of Kos. Free, private parking is available on site.​​

Poi.Name: Sevi Sun 1
Poi.Description:
​

​Studios at Sevi Sun I are simply furnished with tiled floors. They are all equipped with a mini fridge, electric kettle and cooking rings. The private bathroom features a hairdryer.

Guests can take a refreshing dip in the pool or relax at the sun beds available on the sun terrace. Drinks, fresh juices and light snacks are served at the bar, while continental and full English breakfast is prepared in the morning.

Within just 20 metres from the property, you will find a mini market, where you can buy your daily necessities. At 2.5 km, you can also visit the archaeological site of Asklipeion. Hippocrates Airport is 35 km away. Free Wi-Fi and free on-site parking are provided.​

Poi.Name: Sevi Sun 2
Poi.Description:
​

Sevi Sun apartments feature wooden furnishings and have tiled floors. Each comes with a separate bedroom and a kitchenette featuring a dining table, mini fridge and cooking rings. A hairdryer can be found in the bathroom.

Guests can start their day with a continental or full English breakfast and later enjoy refreshing drinks, coffees and light meals at the snack bar. Sun beds and umbrellas are available around the pool.

The nearest beach is 500 metres away from the property, while 20 metres away you can find a mini market. Kos Airport is 35 km away. Free Wi-Fi is provided on the common areas and free on-site parking is possible.​

Poi.Name: Skoufezis Studios
Poi.Description:
​

Skoufezis Studios is a complex of 17 Studio apartments.

Each room is 28sqm all spacious, well furnished with telephone, balcony and bath on demand!

The comlex is located in the centre of kardamena, only a minute walk from the sandy beaches where you can enjoy watersports and sunbathing!

For your convenience there is a bar and a reception desk on the ground floor.

Our customers can also use the Agrelli pool across the road free of charge!​​

Poi.Name: Sofia Katras Studios
Poi.Description:
​

Centrally located in Tigaki’s square, 20 metres from the sandy beach, Sofia Katras Studios offers self-catered accommodation. The studios feature a furnished balcony with views of the Aegean Sea.

All air-conditioned rooms are decorated in warm colours and have a TV. Each includes a kitchenette with fridge and cooking rings. Studios Sofia Katras offer a dining area.

Restaurants and shops are within 50 metres from the Sofia Katras Studios. Kos Airport is at 9 km and lively Kos Town is 13 km away. Free public parking is possible nearby the studios.​

Poi.Name: Hotel Sonia
Poi.Description:
​

The hotel's focal point is its family run atmosphere, jasmine scented garden and communal terrace where guests gather for breakfast in the morning or relaxing drinks and conversation in the afternoon and evening. A veritable United Nations! A true Greek experience that is a must to enjoy on the beautiful island of Kos.

 

Perhaps most noteworthy of all, Sonia and her two sons, Yiannis and Afedoulis provide you with a genuine home-from-home feeling and they are always ready to help with advice and assistance.​

Poi.Name: Jeanne & Sarah Isaac
Poi.Description:
Quiet, secluded, hillside cottage. ‘Paradiso”, is a traditional 2 bedroom retreat, set in idyllic location on the island of Kos. It is the perfect place to relax and unwind.

The cottage has spectacular 180-degree views across the Aegean to the island of Kalymnos and is set at the foot of Mount Dikeos with dramatic mountain views.

This charming two double bedroom cottage can sleep up to six people. Fully air conditioned, large sitting room with WIFI and satellite TV. The cottage has been fully renovated to a high boutique standard with tasteful furnishings throughout, including rustic wooden floors, traditional beamed ceilings and original fireplaces.

Fully functioning, charming marble topped kitchen, perfect for entertaining, it includes fridge freezer, ceramic hob cooker, washing machine and air conditioning.

Poi.Name: Dalekos Konstantinos
Poi.Description:
​The apartment is placed in an exceptional environment in an attitude of 100 meters above sea level and 300 meters distance to the beach, overlooking the Kamari bay offering a spectacular panoramic view of Kefalos bay, the Kamari harbour, Nysiros island and the Turkish coast.

The apartment is located in a private residence with garden of 7.000 m² and landscaped swimming pool.

The apartment is located in a building near the owner’s house.

The luxury apartment is at the first floor of the building and facing the south with a terrace offering a spectacular sea view.

Has an inside area of 46m² and a balcony and terrace area of 24m² a total of 70m².

Is designed to accommodate 2 to 3 people.

Sleeps 3: - bedroom: 2 single beds

- living room: 1 single sofabed.

A Mediterranean garden of 5000 square meters in 3 heights.

With more than 200 plants such as cacti, plants and shrubs

Poi.Name: Judy
Poi.Description:
​The house comprises of a large lounge (32' LCD TV with basic Sky package), dining area and kitchen plus a separate utility/kitchen room. Therefore there are two cookers, two sinks, a washing machine, dishwasher, microwave and everything is in place for you. Hi speed WI-FI is accessible throughout the house.

Bedroom 1 has a double bed and built in wardrobes (32'LCD TV)

Bedroom 2 has two single beds and built in wardrobes (21' TV)

Bedroom 3 has a 4ft divan/sofa bed that sleeps two persons (14'TV) and built in wardrobes.

Bathroom 1 has a bath, (including shower), toilet and wash basin.

Bathroom 2 has a walk in shower, toilet and wash basin.

There is a large patio at the front of the house with table and chairs and another patio at the rear with a picnic bench.

Poi.Name: Karen Tobin
Poi.Description:
​The Stone Cottage is a traditional Greek house which has been renovated over the last 3 years. 2010 is the first year of renting. It is situated 10 minutes (by car) to Kos Town and 2 km to the nearest resort of Tigaki. Which has one of the best sandy beaches on the island. There are 4 adult and 2 children's bicycles available for use (free of charge).

The cottage comprises of 3 large rooms.

Room 1 is the kitchen and sitting room area together (with fireplace).

Room 2 has a double bed and 2 put-up-beds which can be opened .

Room 3 has two single beds.

There is a large toilet and bath (with shower) and washing machine.

The house is fully insulated with double window panes. Hot water is supplied by solar system or electricity and there is air-conditioning.

The view from the front of the cottage is looking over the owners vineyard to the Aegean sea, with the islands of Pserimos and Turkey in the distance.

The owners live 80m away and are available for any help you may need

Poi.Name: Tassos Kombogiorgas
Poi.Description:
The hostess is a paintress from Belgium, who constructed this paradies in the last 27 years. Her private house, a small restaurant - cafe, an art galery and 3 studios are part of this complex in a wonderful garden, at a quiet, green village, 300 meters above sea level, on Dikeon mountain, on the island of Kos! The studio (40 qm) is on the 1st floor, has sitting area, a table, a double bed, a bathroom, a kitchenette, a big balcony with breathtaking view and a garden! On the walls are hanging paintings painted by the hostess!

At the cafe of Orea Ellas, wich is in the same garden (studio stays secluded and quiet) you can enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at special prices.

Poi.Name: Kipriotis Village Resort
Poi.Description: Kipriotis Village Resort is an ideal Village, where architecture and natural beauty, functionality and spaciousness of both outdoor and indoor areas are perfectly combined. The Resort complex is built on a surface of 135.000m2 and is situated on the north east coast of Kos - the isle of Hippocrates, father of medicine – directly on the beach at a distance of only 3km from Kos town and 25km from Kos International Airport. Surrounded by beautifully tended gardens, the hotel complex features an impressive holistic wellness spa centre “ANAVIOSI by Hippocrates Holistic Wellness Spa”, a number of different restaurants, coffee shops and bars as well as a wide range of excellent sport, leisure and entertainment facilities.

Poi.Name: Gaia Garden Hotel
Poi.Description:
Αυτό το υπέροχο, σαν επίγειος παράδεισος, ξενοδοχείο βρίσκεται σε ένα θέρετρο της πόλης της Κω σε μια ήσυχη περιοχή που λέγεται Λάμπη. Αποτελείται από ένα κύριο κτίσμα, περιτριγυρισμένο από μπανγκαλόου που βρίσκονται στους υπέροχους κήπους που έχουν φτιάξει οι ιδιοκτήτες. Οι επισκέπτες έχουν τη χαρά να απολαύσουν αυτή την όαση πρασίνου με τους φοίνικες. Στον κήπο οι επισκέπτες θα βρουν την πισίνα, και την παιδική πισίνα, που περιβάλλεται από ξύλινες ξαπλώστρες, ομπρέλες και το μπαρ της πισίνας. Οι επισκέπτες μπορούν επίσης να απολαύσουν ένα αφέψημα στην βεράντα δίπλα στην πισίνα και να δροσίζονται από το απαλό αεράκι της θάλασσας.
Η κοντινότερη παραλία απέχει περίπου 500 μέτρα από το ξενοδοχείο είναι αμμώδης και  καλά οργανωμένη, προσφέροντας μερικά θαλάσσια σπορ. Για τους επισκέπτες που επιθυμούν δραστηριότητες, το ξενοδοχείο προσφέρει επίσης μπάσκετ, βόλεϊ, τένις, εξοπλισμό για beach volleyball και γυμναστήριο, είναι όλα στη διάθεση των φιλοξενουμένων. Το τακτικά δρομολόγιο του λεωφορείο της γραμμής μεταφέρουν τους φιλοξενούμενους μας από και προς το κέντρο της πόλης της Κω. Αυτό το μικρό ξενοδοχείο προσφέρει φιλοξενία, χαλάρωση και ηρεμία σαν επίγειος παράδεισος, για αυτό και οι επισκέπτες μας επιστρέφουν κάθε χρόνο.

Poi.Name: Gaia Village Hotel
Poi.Description:
Located just a short walk from the centre of Tigaki Village and 300 metres from the beach, Gaia Village provides freshwater pools and complimentary continental breakfast.

Surrounded by lush gardens, these cheerful rooms are fully equipped for your holiday needs. After a tasty breakfast in the morning, you can relax in one of the sun beds next to the pool and enjoy the Mediterranean sun.

The excellent location of Gaia Village allows you to be very close to all that Kos has to offer. There are plenty of shops and tavernas nearby and water sport activities at Tigaki Beach. You can also rent a car from the resort to explore this exciting island further and take advantage of the free private parking.

Poi.Name: Gaia Royal
Poi.Description:
Excellently located, just a short walk from the beach and Lido Waterpark, this large resort offers plenty of organised entertainment, large outdoor swimming pools and an all-inclusive package deal.

Gaia Royal has everything you need for a fun, family break in Kos. You can relax on one of the many sun beds around the pools, whilst the children join in the fun and games with the hotel’s animation team. Enjoy a game of tennis on one of Gaia Royal’s large courts or have a quiet stroll to the nearby sandy beach. Relax and enjoy a glass of wine after a day of sunbathing.

Gaia Royal’s provides you with a comfortable base for exploring the rest of the charming island of Kos. Take advantage of the resort’s free private parking and hire a car, or use the nearby local bus, which has excellent links to the centre of Kos. The charming fishing village of Mastichari is also just 5 km away.

Poi.Name: Gaia Palace
Poi.Description:
Gaia Palace is a 5-star hotel, providing luxurious accommodations, deluxe pools and a grand buffet. This modern facility is located in Mastihari, a small traditional fishing village, with panoramic views.

Gaia’s rooms are air conditioned and offer flat screen TVs. Wi-Fi is available for free throughout the entire hotel. All rooms feature deluxe bathrooms with modern fittings.

Guests can take a swim in one of Gaia’s 2 outdoor pools, relax in a shaded terrace or walk through the garden. Inside, the Gaia Palace has a large indoor pool, a modern fitness center and a sauna.

The hotel offers a grand breakfast buffet daily. Guests can enjoy their meals in the outdoor seating area.

The Gaia Palace is located less than 550 yards from the sea and is less than a half hour drive from the historic Myndus Gate and Greek Amphitheater.

Poi.Name: Therma
Poi.Description:
​

Therma are located in the southeastern part of the island, about 13km from the town of Kos.
The landscape has a wild beauty, steep slopes, cliffs and dark pebbles as a result of tectonic disturbances and volcanic eruptions millions of years ago.
  The area takes its name from the hot springs that gush for centuries. These hot spring waters are rich in calcium, potassium, sodium, sulfur and magnesium that are relevant for the healing of skin, arthritic and rheumatic diseases, but also for the aesthetics of the skin. The temperature of the water ranges from 30 to 50 degrees Celsius.
  The experience is invaluable, a natural Spa! In front of the beach has been created a small lake that is separated from the rest of the beach with rocks that allow seawater to enter and cool the hot water. The beach is suitable for all ages and for all seasons.
  You can visit Therma either by bus or by any private means of transport.

Poi.Name: Planet Gym
Poi.Description:
​

Make exercise part of your daily routine. This gym is fully equipped with advanced gum equipment such as treadmills, steppers and multi-stations for weight gain. It has experienced trainers for group exercise classes with degree in physical education and sports science. All this in very reasonable prices and special offers.

Gym facilities and services include:

  •  Weight and gum machines
  • Group exercise classes (Aerobic/ step, Yoga, Pilates, Abs & Hips training program , TRX suspension training, cross fit, body pump, zumba, kickboxing, hip hop for kids).
  • Power plate/ vibration training
  • Holistic therapies/ massage
  • Sauna
  • Solarium
  • Personal training
  • Diet and nutritional schedule in cooperation with a certified dietitian
  • Supplements dietary
  • Coffee protein and juice, protein bars

Visit the gym to create the ideal fitness program for you. Gym's goal is to show to the client that physical activity is more than just an everyday routine. It can become the most enjoyable part of your daily lives!  ​

Poi.Name: Evexis Fish Spa
Poi.Description: ​The company Evexis Fish Spa is a company that is activated in the space of relaxation and well-being and more specifically in the space of relaxation with specifically fish GARRA RUFA.The company is unique that offers individual aquariums with specifically UV filters for water with ISO certification that ensures the best quality and safety in the use of service.

Poi.Name: Kos Hotel Body n' Soul Spa
Poi.Description:
​A multiplex for sport and relaxation.
Modern fitness center with scientific staff, rooms for group programs and group dances, mini spa, with stimulation and relaxation services for everyone.

Poi.Name: Evexis Fish Spa
Poi.Description: ​The company Evexis Fish Spa is a company that is activated in the space of relaxation and well-being and more specifically in the space of relaxation with specifically fish GARRA RUFA.The company is unique that offers individual aquariums with specifically UV filters for water with ISO certification that ensures the best quality and safety in the use of service.

Poi.Name: Artemis Hamam
Poi.Description: ​Traditional scrub and foam massage, Aromatherapy, Anti-cellulite massage, Anti-stress massage, Medical massage, Four-hand "Artemis" massage, Mud mask, Seaweed mask, Chocolate mask, Facial treatment.​

Poi.Name: Katerina
Poi.Description:
​

The best day of your holidays!

Travel with Katerina and learn about 3 traditional islands. The ship starts every day from Kos harbor at 10 a.m. and returns about 6 p.m.

The first island is Platti where the ship stays for 1:30 h, you can go swimming and snorkeling in the clear blue of Aegean sea. After swimming a BBQ lunch is served on board. This is included in the price. Second island is Kalymnos witch is known as the sponge island. You can visit the sponge factory or walk around the town of the island, Pothia. On the departure traditional donuts are served. The last stop is Pserimos where you can swim to a sandy beach. On board is served cool watermelon. After Pserimos the sails are raised and the adventure begins.​

Poi.Name: Horizon Surfing
Poi.Description:
​Windsurfing lessons, school and rental.

Kitesurfing lessons, school and rental.

Catamaran, S.U.P and Yoga.

Poi.Name: Water-proof και kitesurfing kos
Poi.Description:
Water-proof at Mastihari offers windsurfing, kitesurfing, catamaran and sailing both for beginners and advanced.

School and rental.

Poi.Name: Arian diving Center
Poi.Description:
​The Arian Diving Centre has been established in Kos, the beautiful Greek island, and through extensive professionalism has managed to gain an international reputation.
The Diving Centre is located in Kardamena, a short walk from many of the hotels, shops, banks, bars/restaurants and any other services you might require. Kardamena is a village located 30 kilometres from Kos town and 5 kilometres from "Hippocrates" International Airport.

Poi.Name: GUST windsurfing
Poi.Description:
​GUST! Windsurfing School Kos is located in Kardamena, in the south coast of the greek Island of Kos. Just on the beach of the Portobello Royal Hotel.
It is equipped with NAISH windsurfing sails and boards, as well as HOBIECAT 15 catamarans.

It offers:
Windsurfing lessons, rental and storage.
Catamaran lessons, rental and trips.
SUP rental.
Kitesurfing lift.
Kids lessons.
Groups and family deals.
Lessons in English, Italian, German, Russian and Greek.
You can book your lesson or rental online, to be sure you have your equipment or instructor exactly when you need it.
A free transfer is also available from your hotel or apartment in the Kardamena area.

Poi.Name: Agios Fokas
Poi.Description:
Proud owner of the "Blue Flag", Agios Fokas beach combines white and black sand with gorgeous pebble.  It is approximately 8 km southeast of the town of Kos and just 2 km. from Thermes.


There are several organized points with umbrellas, along with Agios Fokas beach bar. If you prefer a quiet spot to enjoy the beautiful scenery you will definitely find it along the beautiful coast.


To get there you can use the bus, get a taxi or your own vehicle, and for those who like sports, they can use their bicycle.

Poi.Name: Dino Rentals
Poi.Description: ​Bike, Scooter, Motorbike, ATV and Buggy rentals.

Poi.Name: Moto Club
Poi.Description: ​08:00 - 23:00. Vehicle delivery. Bikes, motorbikes, ATV, Buggy, Εlectric Βikes.

Poi.Name: Moto Angels
Poi.Description: ​​Road Services. Full insurance. Vehicle delivery without kilometer count. From 08:30 to 22:00

Poi.Name: Adris Nissia Travel
Poi.Description:
Air tickets.

Travels to Turkey, Nysiros, Kalymnos.

Three islands tour, Patmos, Rhodes.

Catamaran tickets. Blue Star Ferries.

Poi.Name: Kentrikon
Poi.Description:
​Main Blue Star Ferries Agent.

Trips to various islands.

Air and Ferry tickets.

Sea Jet, Hellenic Sea Ways, Nissos, Kalymnos, A.N.E.M Kalymnou.

Money Exchange.

Poi.Name: Arion Travel
Poi.Description:
​Official Bodrum Express Agent.

Air and Ferry tickets.

Poi.Name: InterKos
Poi.Description: ​Trips to nearby islands and Ferry Tickets.

Poi.Name: Moto Rent
Poi.Description: ​Motorbike, bike and ATV rent.

Poi.Name: Moto Rent
Poi.Description: ​Motorbike, bike and ATV rent.

Poi.Name: Moto 1
Poi.Description: Bikes, Motorbikes, Buggy, ATV.

Poi.Name: Hot Escape Rentals
Poi.Description: Bicycles, motobikes, Scooter, A.T.V., Buggy, Electronic Bike, Junior Bike, Road R. Bike​

Poi.Name: Easy Rider
Poi.Description:
​Rent Harley, buggy, motorbikes, ATV, bikes, large bikes, cars..

Free delivery at your place.

Poi.Name: Safe Wheels Rental
Poi.Description: ​Unlimited kilometers, insurance, Taxes, Delivery to your hotel, Free helmets, Free map kos and Excellent service 24hours.

Poi.Name: Smart Rent
Poi.Description:
Smart Rent is located in two offices in Kos island one in Lambi Ethelonton Polemiston and one in G. Papandreou. Rent cars, scooters, bicycles & ATV Quad.

It covers all your needs for car rental. Rent cars in smart prices and live unique moments on the island where fun does not stop . Discover the unique historical and archaeological monuments with cars, motorcycles, bicycles & ATV Quad. Trust Smart Rent.

Poi.Name: Moto Harley
Poi.Description:
​Welcome at Moto Harley !
Moto Harley started in 1993 as a bicycle rental with a few scooters on the island of Kos.
During the years, it grow bigger and besides bicycles and scooters, now also rents quads, motors and trikes.
In it's shops you will find the most widest range from childbicycle to electric bicycle with all kinds of accessories such as childseats, tandems, half bikes, mini vans from the brands called Giant, Gazelle and Sparta.

Poi.Name: SEVI
Poi.Description:
​Sevi Rent a Car is a family owned car rental company in Kos, Greece. The company was founded in 1992 being among the first car rental companies at that period. The successful development started with the buying of 10 brand new cars. Today Sevi Rent a Car covers all Kos' destinations , providing services to the car rental customers by offering designated pick-up points all over the island. 

A dynamic entrance in the market means a full insurance and full roadside assistance, which is available 24/7. Additionally, for those who travel with small children, Sevi Rent a Car offers free-of-charge the children seats that may be required

Poi.Name: DEL PORTO Cafe Restaurant
Poi.Description:
"DEL PORTO" (Restaurant - Cafe) is situated in the center of Kos-harbour, facing the sea and the dolphins fountain. The dishes are all freshly made of high qouality produce and are excellent to hte taste.

Freshly home made desserts, the firendly and professional service personell will comply to your every wish.

The cuisine is open 24/7. Come to the "DEL PORTO" and we will open the doors to a unique experience speaking English, Turkish, Dutch, Russian and Hebrew.

Poi.Name: Soyvlaki Bar
Poi.Description:
​Gyros Plate,

Mix Grill,

Soyvlaki,

Kebab

All meats are fresh!

Poi.Name: ALBERTO
Poi.Description: ALBERTO RESTAURANT GRILL HOUSE is a well known restaurant not only for the tourists but for the locals also. From 2012 opened a beautiful restauran right on the sea front with beautiful view of Aegean sea. You can dine on a variety of fresh fish also. We have an extensive menu full of all the delicious. We are open from early morning until night. It serves Llight snacks, gyros, souvlaki on the grill and burgers.​

Poi.Name: G. PLAZA
Poi.Description:
​PIZZA

PASTA

CREPES

WAFFLES

BREAKFAST 

DRAUGHT BEERS

and Fresh Meats...

every day...

GYROS ..KEBAB

Poi.Name: XL Cafe Bar
Poi.Description:
​XL Cafe Bar offers a nice atmoshpere with chill out music.

Besides your coffee you can enjoy a wide variety of Cocktails in a very pleasant enviroment.

Poi.Name: CARAVELLE
Poi.Description: ​We are a restaurant with locals and foreign costumers close to the beach, with traditional Greek cuisine and fresh fish. We are open all year and we are expecting you to enjoy the nice atmosphere and our nice food.​

Poi.Name: SOLE MARE Bistro Cafe
Poi.Description: ​SOLE MARE BISTRO CAFE is a cafeteria with comfortable, nice and new environment for enjoyble times near the sea and good italian cousine, chill out music, cocktails, sweet crepes, ice cream and good attitute.

Poi.Name: Dihtaki
Poi.Description: ​We are located next to the sea. We offer ouzo or raki along with four free appetizers and garlic bread (the VOLIOTIKO system). After lunch offer crepe with ice cream​.

Poi.Name: Nick The Fisherman
Poi.Description:
​Sea Food restaurant. Since 1942.

Family Business from father to son.

We don't have any meat. Only Fish.

We have the bigest collection of oysters and shell fish in Greece.

Poi.Name: Votsalakia
Poi.Description:
​Family tavern since 1998. We respect the costumers wether they are locals or tourists. 

We are open every day offering fresh fishes and sea food along with traditional meze! 

We are waiting for you to enjoy our sea view and taste our delicius food.

Poi.Name: Taverna Evdokia
Poi.Description: ​Home made food, traditional appetizers, fresh fish, meats on the grill. Mama cooks everything.

Poi.Name: El Gallo
Poi.Description:
​Spanish Tapas at the seaside of Kos town.

Different food like: Meat, Spanish Bread, Fish, Vegeterian Food.

Poi.Name: De Haven
Poi.Description:
Open all day long De Haven Restaurant offers authentic Greek and International cuisine. All ingredients are fresh and of superior quality. Their meat is fresh, selecting the best for our guests. All vegetables are fresh. Their Gastronomy will travel you to a tasteful world having Kos harbour and its people as background!

Relax, enjoy your coffee, breakfast, lunch, dinner or  drink beers and relax watching at their big screens all sports events!

Poi.Name: Agios Fokas Beach Bar
Poi.Description:
​The abslolut paradise in the of Kos!!!

The Agios Fokas beach is a splendid natural bay with crystal clear waters and natural shade of native trees, located in the South and windless side of the island, just 7 km from the town of Kos. In this ideal landscape it has been created a multiplex of creative fun by the sea !

For all ages, young and old, besides the beautiful location with the magnificent sea, you have the ability to exercise in a private Beach Volley court or you can lift weights at the outdoor gym, while your children play in a safe playground.

With reasonable prices, with music perfectly in tune with the environment and with a great variety of dishes, you are expected to have a good time! 

Happy Summer!

Poi.Name: Barbouni
Poi.Description: ​The definition of fine Cuisine in Kos island! Amazing seafood plates, great meze's, fish directly from the sea and for the perfect ending, marvelous cocktails .. join their happy and loosy mood.

Poi.Name: Platinum
Poi.Description: To Platinum Καφέ διαθέτει μπιλιάρδα, υπολογιστές για ιντερνετ, και προβάλλονται ζωντανά ευρωπαϊκά και διεθνή παιχνίδια ποδοσφαίρου κ.α.

Poi.Name: Galatea
Poi.Description:
Galatea bar dominates the fun of Locals and tourists for the last 30 years ... It started playing foreign music up until 2004, when it ended in a purely Greek style. Since then it has the identity of a Greek Club! It is a beautiful place, with three central bars, two on the ground floor of the club and another one at the loft. During the summer months it has a sitting area in it's yard for those who are looking for something more relaxed.

It offers a wide variety of cocktails and drinks ...

It is their pleasure to visit it and make you have a wonderful night​.

Poi.Name: Three stars
Poi.Description: ​Three Stars is a beach restaurant with friendly environment, cool breeze and pleasant atmosphere. You can visit it to taste the delicious food and have a nice time.​

Poi.Name: Angelina's House
Poi.Description:
​Angelina's House has very good Greek cuisine, everything cooked on grill. It also serves fresh fish.

It is a family business with good service.

Poi.Name: Platanos Restaurant Coffee Bar
Poi.Description:
​Platanos Restaurant opened on 1979 in the historical Platanos square, between the perennial Hippocrates tree, Lotzias mosque, the Italian headquarter and the ancient agora. It has been accommodated in an old Italian building of 1935's that during the Italian domination used to be, Officers Club and it has been renovated recently.
From early in the morning on the ancient agora view side, long drinks, coffees and sweets are served. On the other part where you can see Hippocrates tree you can taste dishes, always based on fresh raw materials, seafood, meat and vegetables from our Mediterranean and Greek creative kitchen.
Kitchen opens from 12 o'clock in the evening for lunch. During the night you can enjoy your dinner except downstairs also on the ‘’secret balcony’’ with the panoramic view of ancient Agora and Neratzia Castle. Dinner is served accompanied by live music. Except dinner you can enjoy till late your drink or a cocktail always with the quality that Platanos is known about .

Poi.Name: Russia
Poi.Description: Traditional Russian restaurant with sea food and grill.​

Poi.Name: Baya Beach
Poi.Description:
​Beach bar - restaurant.

Sun-beds - Umbrellas,

Beach Volley.

Various Games,

Beer Pong,

Backgammon,

Friendly enviroment,

Plesant staff,

Hand made food.

Poi.Name: Tarzan Pasalimani restaurant
Poi.Description:
On Tarzan Beach, apart from the very nice food and beautiful beach, Tarzan makes his own show and makes the world go crazy! Twice a week you can enjoy live music and every Wednesday you can have fun at the watermellon party.
In the restaurant you will find traditional cuisine and ethnic dishes.

Poi.Name: Srtand Cafee
Poi.Description:
​The Strand Cafe Restaurant is located in the center of Kos. It can serve around 500 people every day because it has sun beds with umbrellas.
The kitchen serves Greek and Scandinavian food. The atmosphere and friendly service is above all in this family environment. A family business that respects it's fellows.

Poi.Name: Psarovarka
Poi.Description: ​Psarovarka is a fish tavern near the sea, with fresh fish and mezes, everything home made.

Poi.Name: Nick's Restaurant Beach Bar
Poi.Description:
Nicks restaurant beach bar is located in the main beach of Kos since 1983, it’s a family place with nice and friendly atmosphere where  you can taste the local and Greek cuisine. Everything is homemade from Nicks wife Eva and all this with admiring the wonderful sea view.
Nicks restaurant in the day time is a beach bar too, where you can spent a lousy day laying on the sun beds and having your snacks , cocktails,  deserts and many more.
NICKS RESTAURANT BEACH BAR IS THE PLACE TO BE, YES PLEASE...

Poi.Name: The Sunburnt Arms
Poi.Description:
Best English breakfast in town.

Don't forget Bingo and Quiz nights.

​Don't miss Sunday Roast.

Free sunbeds.

Free WiFi.

Poi.Name: Mavromatis
Poi.Description:
The tavern Mavromatis operated for 55 years in the wonderful Psalidi Kos.

After three generations of owners remains intact with very high quality of dishes, you can choose from a wide variety of our menu.

They use freshest vegetables, Greek local meats and fresh fish is always a full day in a friendly and hospitable environment literally on the beach where you can enjoy your food and Greek music.

The owners guarantee the most memorable dining experience.

Poi.Name: Plaza
Poi.Description: ​Beautiful seaside restaurant since 1987 with Greek and international cuisine, sunbeds and perfect service.

Poi.Name: Sun Rise
Poi.Description: ​Sun Rise is open from the summer of 1995, with many faithful customers. the restaurant uses mostly local products. Family business with sea view.

Poi.Name: Yatch Cafe Inn
Poi.Description:
​Yatch cafe Inn is a sea side cafe with fantastic view.

It offers perfect service in a quiet and nice environment.

You can enjoy your coffee or drink and try some of the delicious snacks it offers.

Poi.Name: Al Dente
Poi.Description:
​Al Dente is located in a very nice area, near the beach overlooking the sea.
The cuisine is excellent and you will definitely enjoy the food and your visit there.

Poi.Name: Cafe Classic
Poi.Description: ​Cafe Classic, Resataurant, Coctail bar. The right choise!

Poi.Name: Nestoras
Poi.Description:
​Nestoras is a very nice restaurant by the sea. It has a tradition in greek cuisine and is prefered by both Greeks and foreigners alike.
During your vacation do not miss the chance to visit it.

Poi.Name: Ταβέρνα Barbas
Poi.Description:
​Barbas tavern is operating for 30 years and has Greek and cooked cuisine.
In a very nice atmosphere you can enjoy your food.

Poi.Name: Socrates
Poi.Description:
​Since 2001.

Tradition in roast.

Delivery at your place.

Fresh, local meat.

Poi.Name: Lithino
Poi.Description: ​Very good Greek cuisine, family business. Friendly environment! Open daily. It features live music several times a month. Very nice appetizers and traditional dishes, fresh fish and meats. Enjoy ouzo with meze and whatever else you prefer

Poi.Name: Gin's Place
Poi.Description: ​Very nice greek and eastern cousine. Family bussines and pleasant enviroment.

Poi.Name: Arap
Poi.Description:
Arap is a Restaurant that since 1955 keeps the tradition with greek and turkish dishes, like kebabs, vegetables and grilled meat.

You can find it at Platani square.

Poi.Name: Kaza Cafe Bar
Poi.Description:
​Multiplex with many exhibitions (Photograph, handmade jewelry, painting, book exchange, large range of game boards)
Musical events, charity events and event hosting.
Classic Italian building with pleasant surroundings, excellent service whether it is food or drink, from early in the morning till late at night.
And always with low prices.

Poi.Name: Hasan Restaurant
Poi.Description:
Hasan​ restaurant has a wide variety of kebab like:
Kebabs.
Adana kebab.
Tavouklou kebabs.
Lachmatzoun handmade.
Meatballs.

Poi.Name: Acropolis
Poi.Description:
The best pizza in kos town.

Good service and serves coffee too.

Delivery from 06:00 - 00:00

Poi.Name: Broadway
Poi.Description:
Broadway is a restaurant in the town of Kos. In a very nice area you can enjoy some of the nice dishes that offers, either at nght or at noon after a tiresome day.
If you ask where is the best restaurant in Kos, it is likely to show you the way there!

Poi.Name: Ladokola
Poi.Description: ​Nice atmosphere with very good food! Traditional family tavern. Spit and all kinds of snacks…​

Poi.Name: Grill House "Andreas"
Poi.Description:
​Grill house "Andreas" offers quality food in very reasonable prices.

Fresh meat, gyros and kontosouvli are some of the dishes you can find there.

Poi.Name: Da Luz
Poi.Description:
​The new hot spot in the center of Kos.
Nice atmosphere, the best coffee in the perfect location, friendly service and beautiful faces ...
Enjoy your morning coffee watching the people passing by and feel the vitality of the center of Kos.
Also enjoy your evening drink with the sounds of DJ, playing all the latest hits or even classic timeless songs.

Poi.Name: Gin's Corner
Poi.Description: ​Gin's Corner is a traditional cafe in the village of Platani, with nice surroundings and fresh handmade desserts.

Poi.Name: Fuego music cafe
Poi.Description: ​Nargilehs with 20 different flavors of tobacco! The shop has 12 laptops for free use by the customers.​

Poi.Name: Konstantinoypoli
Poi.Description:
Traditional tastes by Nikos Sourasis.​

Delivery 12:00 - 00:00.

Poi.Name: Hot Dog Onion
Poi.Description:
Hot Dog with 5 different flavors for sausage and 6 for onion.
Delivery 12:00 - 00:00.

Poi.Name: Honey & Cinnamon
Poi.Description:
​Honey & Cinnamon offers fresh, traditional donuts along with honey, nuts, chocolate and ice cream.

It also offers crepes in very low prices and various coffes.

Poi.Name: Tavraki Sports Pub
Poi.Description: ​Tavraki sports Pub can provide you with over 1000 sports channels of your favourite sports and over 300 of the latest movies! Friendly enviroment and good service!

Poi.Name: Free Time Restaurant
Poi.Description:
​Free Time is a restaurant which offers fine Greek cuisine and fast food.

Located in kanari, a central and busy street of Kos.

Poi.Name: Frozen Corner
Poi.Description: Forzen yogurt shop.

Poi.Name: Sardelles
Poi.Description:
​Tavern with an emphasis on traditional and local cuisine.
Foods for special categories: vegetarian, meat eaters etc.
Local products are used like honey, vegetables and olive oil.

Poi.Name: Harem
Poi.Description: ​ Dressed in the colors of Anatolia HAREM is located by the sea with Oriental and Greek cuisine. Ready to satisfy every culinary desire of the most demandings ! You can smoke Nargile with more than 10 different flavors. Enjoy cold beers, refreshing cocktails, traveling to the sounds of your favorite music until late at night!

Poi.Name: Le Cafe
Poi.Description: ​Le Café is an all day café bar on the beach of Vas. Georgiou. From morning to night, it is a meeting place for all ages who enjoy great coffee brand Portioli, pastries, light meals and drinks in a pleasant and comfortable environment, with the unique view of the sea keeping the leading role.

Poi.Name: Oromedon
Poi.Description:
​Since 1997 in Zia, operates a very nice tavern called OROMEDON. As the years went by, it made it's own history in good traditional dishes.
There is an extensive menu with traditional recipes.

Poi.Name: Asfendiou Tavern
Poi.Description: ​The tavern Asfendiou is a beautiful, traditional tavern in the square of Asomatos. You can find traditional dishes and appetizers while enjoying the wonderful view.

Poi.Name: Roof Garden
Poi.Description:
​The Roof Garden is a family restaurant with mom's cooking. It has, as the name says, a Roof Garden, and very nice view of the sunset!
Located in the center of the village of Zia, if you visit you will definitely feel the friendly atmosphere of the restaurant.

Poi.Name: Watermill of Zia
Poi.Description:
Watermill of Zia is located in an old restored water mill where it now operates as a traditional cafe.
The site of the old water mill is open to customers.
The cafe has a very nice view and relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

Poi.Name: Sunset Balcony
Poi.Description: Sunset Restaurant is a traditional family tavern which operates 33 years in the village of Zia. It has the best sunset view and spectacular views of the Aegean and Minor Asia, with traditional dishes and delicacies.

Poi.Name: Taverna Zia
Poi.Description:
​Tavern Zia is located at the top of Zia.
It offers a very nice view and very good food in a pleasant atmosphere.

Poi.Name: The Village Tavern
Poi.Description:
​Greek mezes - souvlaki.

Mix Grills - gyros and kids menu.

Poi.Name: Dikaios Tavern
Poi.Description: Dikaios tavern offers traditional dishes, traditional lamb, fresh meats and very good wine in a nice environment.

Poi.Name: Olympia
Poi.Description:
Olympia ​Tavern is located at the foot of "Oromedonta", the only mountain in Kos!
Through the pines and fir trees overlooking the vast sea with its crystal clear waters of the Aegean, and dozens of islands and islets that "swim inside her"!
Enjoy the sunset while drinking your coffee or your red or white - sweet or dry chilled glass of local wine produced in Kos!

Poi.Name: Olympia 2
Poi.Description:
​Olympia 2 ​Tavern is located at the foot of "Oromedonta", the only mountain in Kos!
Through the pines and fir trees overlooking the vast sea with its crystal clear waters of the Aegean, and dozens of islands and islets that "swim inside her"!
Enjoy the sunset while drinking your coffee or your red or white - sweet or dry chilled glass of local wine produced in Kos!

Poi.Name: Barcode
Poi.Description:
Barcode is a cafeteria at the end of Zipari.
It offers very nice coffe and snacks.

Poi.Name: Minima
Poi.Description: Minima serves roasted speciality espresso, at the central street of Zipari.​

Poi.Name: Aegean
Poi.Description: ​Very good food in a traditional charcoal grill! Greek stews and traditional cuisine!​

Poi.Name: Sunset
Poi.Description: ​Great view by the sea! Billiards table soccer and​ computers!​

Poi.Name: Biggys on the beach
Poi.Description: ​Biggys is a family buisness since 1996! It serves illy coffe by the beach and wonderfull cappuccino. It also serves breakfast and lunch with fresh loccel produce

Poi.Name: Artemis
Poi.Description: ​The Artemis is next to the beach, features live music and good service! The dishes offered are very good! Fresh fish and meat.

Poi.Name: Borsalino
Poi.Description: ​Centrally situated, the Borsalino Cafe is open from 10.00 until late serving a variety of coffees, cocktails, beers, soft drinks, ice-cream and anything else that you might like depending on the time of day!

Poi.Name: Chill Out
Poi.Description:
​Chill out is a very nice cafe shop in Mastihari, with nice coffee and friendly staff.

You can go there to chill out and rest after a very tiresome day

Poi.Name: Kenny's
Poi.Description: Kenny's is a restaurant at Mastihari that offers both fast food and grilled meat.​

Poi.Name: Kibotos
Poi.Description: ​Coctail bar in downtown TIGAKI, near the square. Features large tv screens for viewing football games, billiards and various games! Nice Coctails, pleasant atmosphere and good service!

Poi.Name: Harama
Poi.Description:
​Harama is a restaurant in Mastihari, with nice atmosphere and friendly staff.
It serves Greek and international cuisine.

Poi.Name: Vios
Poi.Description:
A family run business which mixes traditional stone walls and a admirable wooden bar,  with luxurious leather sofa’s and a large screen TV for those special events, (and football matches).

The pizza’s are superb, home baked base with plenty of toppings to choose from, and homemade sauces.  Choose from a range of different types including calzone, and stuffed crust pizza and pasta too. (Take away,  and delivery service available to your accommodation).

Poi.Name: Taka Taka Mam
Poi.Description: ​The restaurant is situated in the center of TIGAKI, near the square since 1989! It's a family business with very good food, good service and reasonable prices!​

Poi.Name: Tasos the Kalymnian
Poi.Description:
​Tasos the Kalymnian offers fresh seafood and shellfish that catch by themselves, overlooking the port of Mastichari.
Affordable prices in an enjoyable atmosphere.

Poi.Name: Kalymnos by Periklis
Poi.Description: ​Traditional tavern with view of Mastihari port.

Poi.Name: Tigaki
Poi.Description: Restaurant in downtown Tigaki with sea view! Very good food with great variety of dishes! Excellent service and friendly atmosphere.​

Poi.Name: Nostos
Poi.Description: ​The building were Nostos is, was built in 1926 and was the first building of the settlement. Originally used as a winery , it then was turned into a tavern and now features traditional cuisine and seafood of all kinds.

Poi.Name: Aktogiali
Poi.Description:
​Akrogiali offers traditional dishes, Greek cuisine and fresh fish by the sea.
You can enjoy your food under the sunset, at very affordable prices.

Poi.Name: Traditional Restaurant
Poi.Description: ​Family restaurant that has it's own products from his garden, with a very nice view of the sea and all this, in a cool environment.

Poi.Name: Ioannis Palapanis
Poi.Description: ​Cafeteria - Bakery on the main road of Tigaki

Poi.Name: Aplo Beach Bar
Poi.Description:
Leaving the village Mastichari, at 300 meters opposite the Church Evagelistria emerges the "APLO" beach bar.

Particularly in the evening hours where the color of the sunset fills the yard, are enchanting.
Each room has been studied to the smallest detail, and each corner is different.
Both the simplicity and magic of nature, gains the trust of the visitor immediately, who can not help but feel like home.
Ideal for families who want to enjoy the beach and at the same time enjoy the snacks at  "APLO" beach bar.
Open daily from 10:30 am until late at night with music, snacks, spectacular views to the sea and the beautiful sunset.

Poi.Name: El Greco
Poi.Description: ​El Greco is located near the sea, under the amazing sunset with a really good couisine.

Poi.Name: Mavros
Poi.Description: ​Traditional greek couisine near the sea.

Poi.Name: Horizon Coffee Bar
Poi.Description: ​Horizon coffee Bar is located at the beach of Mastihari in a perfect location. There, you can enjoy your coffee or your drink before or after your swim in the sea.

Poi.Name: Palatiano
Poi.Description:
​Palatiano is a traditional tavern where you can enjoy your meal overlooking the sea.
It offers nice Greek, Mediterranean and international cuisine.

Poi.Name: Majestic
Poi.Description: ​Majestic. a beach bar at Mastihari. In a nice environment and good atmosphere, someone can enjoy his coffee or his drink during the sunny day.

Poi.Name: Kali kardia
Poi.Description:
​Kali Kardia is the first restaurant in Mastihari and one of the first in the island of Kos!
The building was build in 1925 and since 1955 operates as a restaurant. You can find there traditional cuisine and fresh fish.

Poi.Name: Players
Poi.Description:
At the port of Mastihari you will find cafe - bar Players.

With a really nice atmosphere and friendly environment, someone can enjoy his coffee or his drink during the day.

Poi.Name: Blue & White
Poi.Description:
​Visit Blue& White Bar - Restaurant and enjoy the quality and taste it's cuisine and whines.

Try the sea-food and ask for a more personal menu in case of a special event, like birthday e.t.c

They have their own olive oil produced by them, wine, vegetables, eggs and more.

They will try their best to make your visit unforgetable.

Poi.Name: Neohori
Poi.Description:
Neohori is a small coffee shop just outsinde the center of Antimachia.

It is open from 7:00 in the morning and it offers drinks, coffees and snacks.

Poi.Name: Kimisis
Poi.Description: ​A small café in the courtyard of the church.

Poi.Name: Teos Bar
Poi.Description: ​Cafe - Bar at Antimachia village.

Poi.Name: Grab a Bite
Poi.Description: ​A restaurant that offers greek cuisine, gyros and fast food.

Poi.Name: To Steki toy Panteli
Poi.Description: ​Small cafe in Antimacheia.

Poi.Name: Mylopetra
Poi.Description:
​Mylopetra is a cafe in the square of Antimahia beside the traditional windmill and opposite the Folk Museum.
If you visit it, you can enjoy a variety of coffees and taste some of the snack offered there.

Poi.Name: Anemomylos
Poi.Description:
​Anemomylos is located in Antimahia Square in a nice and quiet place. To the right stands the Traditional Mill.
It offers a variety of coffees, drinks and snacks.

Poi.Name: Adagio
Poi.Description: In Adagio you can relax and have fun with Greek music with respect towards the tradition of Greek artists.

Poi.Name: Tesoro Cafe
Poi.Description:
​Tesoro cafe, meaning "Treasure", is located in the center of our island, in the coastal street. In front of the cafe is the palm tree avenue and the Platanos square.

Cafe "Tesoro" is open all seasons of the year, from early morning till late at night. It has capacity of 200 people both inside and outside and it is open for every kind of event in reasonable prices.

At "Tesoro" you can enjoy a nice breakfast, delicious waffles, snacks, salads, refreshing cocktails with some nice music. We offer free wi-fi and cable television.

They wait for you to visit them!

Poi.Name: Traditional Refreshment stand
Poi.Description: ​Mini market shop and a small space to enjoy your coffee or refreshment.

Poi.Name: MSL Joy
Poi.Description:
​Near the square of Antimahia and close to the Airport, you will find cafeteria MSL Joy.
It offers coffees, drinks, breakfast or snacks.

Poi.Name: Peperonis
Poi.Description: ​Handmade pizza dough and fresh ingredients in all foods, such as olive oil and fruits, are some of the things you can find at Peperonis.

Poi.Name: Loustros
Poi.Description:
​Loustros restaurant welcomes you on the beautiful island of Kos, situated along the waterfront of Kardamena.

At Loustros you can find, Greek and Italian cusine and seafood.

Poi.Name: Aegean
Poi.Description:
Aegean restaurant offers tastefull shellfish catched by them. Mussels, wild clams, gialysteres, kydonia and many more.
Visit it to enjoy fine dining.

Poi.Name: Skala
Poi.Description:
At Skala restaurant you can enjoy a wide variety of greek and mediterranean dishes and seafood.

For those who want to view Kardamena from high above there is a Roof Garden.

Poi.Name: Bar 1960
Poi.Description:
​At the corner, exactly at Kardamaina Square, you will find Bar 1960.

You can have fun at night or relax during the day, drinking your coffee or your beer.

Poi.Name: Teos Taverna
Poi.Description:
​Tavern Teos is a traditional tavern with greek cuisine, fresh sea food and fish mezes at the center of Kardamena port, with view of the sea.

Very good service in 7 different languages.

Poi.Name: Taratsa
Poi.Description: The Terrace restaurant offers not only Greek and Mediterranean cuisine but also seafood, in a very nice environment overlooking the sea.

Poi.Name: Blue Note
Poi.Description: ​One of the few restaurants that keep the tradition, Blue Note is located near the waves of the sea, overlooking the port of Kardamena. It has a Roof, a pleasant atmosphere and very good food.

Poi.Name: Jasmine
Poi.Description: ​Greek and International cuisine.

Poi.Name: Yialos
Poi.Description: ​If you are looking for good food and sea food, tavern Gialos is the place you might have to go. Family buisness with a nice family atmosphere and fresh food, all overlooking the port of Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Velvet Cocktails
Poi.Description: ​Velvet Cocktails is located in the center of the port of Kardamena, with beautiful view, high quality cocktails and drinks, as well as coffees and refreshments.

Poi.Name: Romano
Poi.Description:
​Romano restaurant is located in Kardamena, infront of the port.

It offers greek, italian and international cuisine in a beautiful and plesant environment.

Poi.Name: Pelagos
Poi.Description: At Pelagos, enjoy the beautiful view of the Aegean and the tranquil village harbor as you dine. You are invited to try their amazing selection of freshly prepared traditional Greek dishes and also a complete selection of prime steaks. The freshest of fish (which is caught locally), as well as pasta, chicken and chops. Their menu is complemented by unique daily specials and a superior wine list, and an amazing atmosphere.

Poi.Name: Artemis
Poi.Description:
​If you are in Kardamena and looking for a good cocktail bar or a café to relax, then Artemis is a good choice.
With comfortable chairs and a nice view, you can relax choosing one of the cocktails available.

Poi.Name: Atheneon
Poi.Description:
​Good drinks, tasteful snacks and wonderful view are some of the characteristics of Atheneon coffee bar.
You will find the coastal side of Kardamena.

Poi.Name: Pegasus
Poi.Description:
​Cafeteria Pegasus offers coffees, drinks and snacks, overlooking the sea.
The cool atmosphere at the cafeteria Pegasus will definetly make you relax.

Poi.Name: Alexander
Poi.Description: Alexander restuarant offers the best Greek home cooked, mexican and indian food in Kardamena, with friendly and reliable service.

Poi.Name: Snack Attack
Poi.Description: ​Snack Attack is open 24 hours and offers fast food such as hamburgers and sandwiches.

Poi.Name: The Galleon In
Poi.Description:
​Galleon inn pub - cafe is at a more quiet side of Kardamena, near the beach.
There you have fun with your friends, as it has various special nights, such as Bingo Night.

Poi.Name: Naskos tavern
Poi.Description: ​Small tavern near Hippocrates Tree. Gyros made from fresh meat. Firendly service. Dutch snacks.

Poi.Name: Manos
Poi.Description:
​Restaurant Manos has a large variety of fresh seafood, good traditional cuisine and friendly service.
You will be amazed with the homemade desserts and pastries offered in the shop.

Poi.Name: Le Greco
Poi.Description: ​Nice food, good atmosphere, friendly service and all that next to the sea are the ingredients of the restaurant El Greco.

Poi.Name: Anna's
Poi.Description: ​Anna's Restaurant is a family business upon the sea waves, with home made food and delicious breakfast.

Poi.Name: Paradise
Poi.Description: ​Greek cuisine, sea food, snacks and wondefull breakfast are the things that Paradise restaurant offers. And all this near the beach.

Poi.Name: Chris
Poi.Description: ​Chris is a very beautiful cafe - bar, upon the wave, at the center of Kardamena!

Poi.Name: Papanikolaou Snack Bar
Poi.Description: ​Papanikolaou Snack Bar is located near the sea and offers coffees, cocktails and free umbrellas at the beach.

Poi.Name: Jam Bar
Poi.Description:
​In the square of Kardamena you will find the Jam Bar.
Comfortable couches, nice atmosphere and delicious drinks make up the the beautiful scene.

Poi.Name: Koala
Poi.Description:
​Koala is open from 10 in the morning untill 4 at night.

There, you can find nice and fast food, near Kardamena square.

Poi.Name: After Snack Bar
Poi.Description: Για όσους θέλουν να φάνε στα γρήγορα, στην Καρδάμαινα υπάρχει και το After Snack Bar, το οποίο όπως λέει και το όνομά του μένει ανοιχτό μέχρι αργά το βράδσυ.

Poi.Name: Socrates
Poi.Description: Socrates is a family business, in a friendly enviroment. It is open since 1979, with good service, good prices and offers fresh, local products.

Poi.Name: Sun Light
Poi.Description:
​Many snacks, Waffles and home made crepes.

Cocktails from a bartender with 35 years of experience.

Poi.Name: Agora
Poi.Description: ​The restaurant "Agora" is located in the center of the city, behind the main "Platia Eleytherias" and the Municipal Market. In the square of Agia Paraskevi where it is located, you can enjoy your meal or drink under 4 beautiful and huge sycamore trees, aged about 80 years. The coolness of the trees can make your stay at this place very pleasant, and with the quality of the food combined, you can spend two fantastic and unforgettable hours.

Poi.Name: Jumbo Style
Poi.Description:
​Traditional greek cuisine.

Gyros, pizza, pasta, salads, burgers, seafood, snacks, breakfasts.

Poi.Name: Prepon
Poi.Description:
Restaurant Café Bistro “Prepon” is situated next to Kos most visited area,the old market. Beside the church of “Agia Paraskevi”, a bedrock square with numerous guests walking through every day and night.

 Below the beautiful trees, experience their local delights combined with special service. Our philosophy is to highlight the local products through simplicity and quality.

 All day long, starting early in the morning with refreshments till late in the night with splendid food and deserts. They expect you to leave having with you the flavours of the island’s culture.

Welcome at ‘’Prepon’.

Poi.Name: Kostas
Poi.Description: ​With them you will find quality, clean and beautiful enviroment and good prices. Because they love their jobs. The only thing left is to find out by yourselves.

Poi.Name: Museum
Poi.Description:
In a nice environment Apostolis and his professional staff guarantee a perfect dinner-evening.
After your first visit here, you will sure want to come back here.

If it is too cold or too hot to sit outsite, you can also sit inside with air-conditioning.
The kitchen is well-organised and they are working by the HCCAP-certificate.

Museum is frequently visited by tourists as well as Greeks. To avoid being disappointed you better make a reservation if you want to have dinner, especially in high-season.

​

Poi.Name: Fidelio
Poi.Description: Fidelio is a traditional restraurant, opposite of the ancient market. A family business with traditional greek and sea food.

Poi.Name: El Gallo
Poi.Description:
​Spanish Tapas at the seaside of Kos town.

Different food like: Meat, Spanish Bread, Fish, Vegeterian Food.

Poi.Name: De Haven
Poi.Description:
Open all day long De Haven Restaurant offers authentic Greek and International cuisine. All ingredients are fresh and of superior quality. Their meat is fresh, selecting the best for our guests. All vegetables are fresh. Their Gastronomy will travel you to a tasteful world having Kos harbour and its people as background!

Relax, enjoy your coffee, breakfast, lunch, dinner or  drink beers and relax watching at their big screens all sports events!

Poi.Name: Players
Poi.Description:
At the port of Mastihari you will find cafe - bar Players.

With a really nice atmosphere and friendly environment, someone can enjoy his coffee or his drink during the day.

Poi.Name: Blue & White
Poi.Description:
​Visit Blue& White Bar - Restaurant and enjoy the quality and taste it's cuisine and whines.

Try the sea-food and ask for a more personal menu in case of a special event, like birthday e.t.c

They have their own olive oil produced by them, wine, vegetables, eggs and more.

They will try their best to make your visit unforgetable.
