Poi.Name: Jam Bar
Poi.Description:
​In the square of Kardamena you will find the Jam Bar.
Comfortable couches, nice atmosphere and delicious drinks make up the the beautiful scene.

Poi.Name: Koala
Poi.Description:
​Koala is open from 10 in the morning untill 4 at night.

There, you can find nice and fast food, near Kardamena square.

Poi.Name: After Snack Bar
Poi.Description: Για όσους θέλουν να φάνε στα γρήγορα, στην Καρδάμαινα υπάρχει και το After Snack Bar, το οποίο όπως λέει και το όνομά του μένει ανοιχτό μέχρι αργά το βράδσυ.

Poi.Name: Kebab House Steki
Poi.Description:
​Kebab House Steki is located in Kardamena and stays open until the morning.
They expect you to enjoy their delicious fast food.

Poi.Name: Agios Fokas Beach Bar
Poi.Description:
​The abslolut paradise in the of Kos!!!

The Agios Fokas beach is a splendid natural bay with crystal clear waters and natural shade of native trees, located in the South and windless side of the island, just 7 km from the town of Kos. In this ideal landscape it has been created a multiplex of creative fun by the sea !

For all ages, young and old, besides the beautiful location with the magnificent sea, you have the ability to exercise in a private Beach Volley court or you can lift weights at the outdoor gym, while your children play in a safe playground.

With reasonable prices, with music perfectly in tune with the environment and with a great variety of dishes, you are expected to have a good time! 

Happy Summer!

Poi.Name: Stella Maris Snack & Restaurant
Poi.Description: ​Relaxing atmosphere with delicious international and traditional Greek cuisine for every taste! Enjoy your meals and drinks in a unique and relaxing atmosphere, right next to the beach with the sounds of the crushing waves.

Poi.Name: Smiley' s
Poi.Description:
The shop operates 22 years in the center of the village of Marmari, near the sea. The cuisine is Greek and features a charcoal grill.

Special dish is the fried cheese and the fresh seafood

Poi.Name: Spatzennest
Poi.Description: ​The shop has free umbrellas for guests to the beach. Homemade pizza - barbecue, Greek food, a variety of snacks, cocktails, smoothies, ice cream and homemade desserts. Nice view with sunset. The shop is located near the salt lake at the area kanali - Pithos. Unique to the region to combine good food, drink and relax!​

Poi.Name: Chilli Peppers
Poi.Description:
Chilli Peppers is a night bar that opens at 19:00 and closes early in the morning.
The fun does not stop there, with lots of drinks and shots, happy staff and nice music.

Poi.Name: Chilli Peppers
Poi.Description:
Chilli Peppers is a night bar that opens at 19:00 and closes early in the morning.
The fun does not stop there, with lots of drinks and shots, happy staff and nice music.

Poi.Name: Crossroads
Poi.Description:
​Crossroads is a good place to have fun and offers good drinks and beers. It stays open later in the night as a bar.
It's a family business and has very good service.

Poi.Name: Crossroads
Poi.Description:
Crossroads 2 is a place you can have fun and offers good dirnks and beers.

It's a family business and good service.

It's located just across from the Crossroads.

​

Poi.Name: Brothers
Poi.Description: ​Brothers operates since 1994 and is family business, renowned for its fine cocktails and delicious toasts with egg. Among the services offered is the hookah.

Poi.Name: Lush Watersport Bar
Poi.Description: Lush Beach Bar is near the beach and cooperates with the water sports that are near.

Poi.Name: Sagittarius
Poi.Description:
​Sagittatius restaurant, awarded from Trip Advisor with a Certificate of Excellence 2012 - 2013, first opened in 1989 and offers you a warm welcome in a friendly atmosphere.

The establishment has 1 fountain, 3 watefalls, lots of greenery, comfortable seating and air conditioning.

Parking is avaliable behind the restaurant with easy entrance and exit.

Most items on the menu are avaliable to take - away.

There is also kids and vegetarian menu.

All credit cards are accepted.

Poi.Name: Barbouni
Poi.Description: ​The definition of fine Cuisine in Kos island! Amazing seafood plates, great meze's, fish directly from the sea and for the perfect ending, marvelous cocktails .. join their happy and loosy mood.

Poi.Name: Ultra Marine Bar
Poi.Description: ​Ultra Marine is one of Kardamena's best bars. Fantastic atmosphere, brilliant music and the best staff, making your summer one to remember!

Poi.Name: Yanni Restaurant
Poi.Description: ​Yanni Restaurant

Poi.Name: Treasure Island
Poi.Description:
Take your shoes off and relax on the wonderfully cooling grass that Treasure Island is renowned for. The balmy Greek evenings are even more perfect when you are sipping a delicious cold beer or cocktail and listening to the crickets serenade you.

Situated on the very edge of Kardamena, Treasure Island is central, yet away from the hedonistic ‘bar street’. It is definitely worth a visit both on your way to the main square at the beginning of your evening, or on your stroll home after a great night out.

Treasure Island also has party nights with great music late in the night.

Poi.Name: Rio Snack Bar
Poi.Description:
​Rio Snack Bar stays open 24 hours which means that you can enjoy your lunch there any time of the day.
Gyros, burgers and sandwiches are some of the foods you will find there.

Poi.Name: The Pub
Poi.Description:
​Traditional English Pub... without the English weather!
The pub is built in "Old English style" and its interior is from all over the world, including antiques, all of which come from England.
THe Pub Services: Sky Sports Plasma & Wide Screen TV's, Beer Garden, Pool Table & Games Internet, Air Conditioning and English Draught Beers.
Just like your local!

Poi.Name: Marmari go kart center
Poi.Description:
​Marmari go kart center is located in between marmari & tigaki - kos island.
Opening hours summer season 9.30am - 23.00pm.
All drivers are insured by Allianz.​ Electro FUN CARS for juveniles aged 3-6 are available and normal go karts for ages 7 - 10!

Poi.Name: Bliss Bar
Poi.Description: ​At Bliss Bar you will like every minute! A very nice place with great and very friendly staff and cheap drinks!

Poi.Name: Cocktail Bar Paradiso
Poi.Description: ​Paradiso Cafe Bar is next to Kris Mari hotel at kos, kardamaina with lots of cocktails, wine, long drinks, special happenings and much more!!!

Poi.Name: Ariadni
Poi.Description: ​Good food and friendly service in the restaurant Ariadne, in  the picturesque streets of Kardamena.​​

Poi.Name: Garden
Poi.Description: ​Situated in the heart of Kardamena, this 80 year old house has been converted into one of the islands most renowned cocktail bars, offering a beautiful atmosphere and friendly service for more than 12 years. A true heaven!

Poi.Name: Phonenet
Poi.Description: ​Internet Cafe, Printing and computer peripherals

Poi.Name: Platinum
Poi.Description: To Platinum Καφέ διαθέτει μπιλιάρδα, υπολογιστές για ιντερνετ, και προβάλλονται ζωντανά ευρωπαϊκά και διεθνή παιχνίδια ποδοσφαίρου κ.α.

Poi.Name: Porto Eye
Poi.Description: ​Seaside café with spectacular view of Kardamena port, friendly service and very good coffee!

Poi.Name: Kafenio o Daskalos
Poi.Description: ​Traditional Cafe, in the center of the village of Kardamena!​

Poi.Name: Atlantis
Poi.Description: ​Greek cuisine, Meze, snacks, organized beach on the sea front

Poi.Name: Malibu
Poi.Description: ​Malibu Beach Bar restaurant is a little hidden gem situated just on the outskirts of  Kos Kardamena, with a beautiful beach in front and a tropical garden with bar and swimming pool inside, you can spend your day relaxing in style.

Poi.Name: Casa Rossa
Poi.Description: ​Seaside cafe in the village of Kardamena with sunbeds on the beach, great coffee and cool breeze!​

Poi.Name: Poseidonia
Poi.Description: ​Family owned restaurant, next to the sea shore with fresh seafood and local delicacies!​

Poi.Name: Big Mike's
Poi.Description: ​Tavern on the sea shore near the village of Kardamena with traditional Greek cuisine! There is a playground!​

Poi.Name: Memories Bar
Poi.Description: ​Cafeteria in the center of Kardamena, good coffee and friendly service!

Poi.Name: Tony' s Cuisine Corner
Poi.Description: Centrally situated in the village of Kardamena, with very good food, friendly atmosphere and a private parking!​

Poi.Name: Origin
Poi.Description: ​Cafeteria in the center of Kardamena with Pool Bar and a pool!​

Poi.Name: Galatea
Poi.Description:
Galatea bar dominates the fun of Locals and tourists for the last 30 years ... It started playing foreign music up until 2004, when it ended in a purely Greek style. Since then it has the identity of a Greek Club! It is a beautiful place, with three central bars, two on the ground floor of the club and another one at the loft. During the summer months it has a sitting area in it's yard for those who are looking for something more relaxed.

It offers a wide variety of cocktails and drinks ...

It is their pleasure to visit it and make you have a wonderful night​.

Poi.Name: Nouen Trig
Poi.Description: ​Chinese restaurant in the center of Kardamena​

Poi.Name: Bannana Beach Bar
Poi.Description: Βeach bar situated on the beach on the edge of kardamena (10 minute walk from the square toward the mountain). It' s there since 1993 and has built up a good customer base and has lots of returning customers each year, it sells snack food 9am-5pm and drinks all day and night. Enjoy the friendly relaxed and fun atmoshere with stunning views.​

Poi.Name: Anemos
Poi.Description: Waterfrond restaurant with fresh fish and authentic Greek cuisine​!

Poi.Name: Ikogenia Xrisopoulou
Poi.Description: ​Family seaside tavern with fresh seafood, good service and a cool breeze!​

Poi.Name: The Ice Box
Poi.Description: ​Ice cream - Coffee - Drinks​

Poi.Name: Global Cafe
Poi.Description:
​A place for relaxation and entertainment for young people but also for those who feel young.

In the heart of Kos Town, Global Cafe is a hangout for all hours of the day with coffee, natural juices from fresh exotic fruits, unbeatable cocktails, "clean" drinks and shots as well as various snacks while the dj strams mainstream and ethnic music but also alternative rock melodies to the speakers from early in the morning till late at night. The "heart" of Global Cafe who with the help of Eyla has pioneered for over ten years in the entertainment field, is none other than Hassan.

With staff that have bonded almost from the the first year of Global Cafe's operation, friends can now take a part of Global with them from the Bazaar section which offers mementoes that highlight Global Cafe's style and character. From 8.30 in the morning, with a WiFi connection for the networked but also with classic games like backgammon and Uno, Global Cafe is the place to relax from the hustle and bustle of the town while the specially designed garden area transports you places more oriental than you have been accustomed to. 

Periodically, Hassan organizes events within Global Cafe with artists like Georgia Dagaki, Palliroia and Domenica but also at third party venues such as the Castle and the Stadium with artists like Hatziyanni, Olympiou and Orfeas Peridis giving their own distinct rhythm to the cultural events of the city.​

Poi.Name: Pigi
Poi.Description: ​Restaurant located near the old spring of Pili, a realy nice place to eat.​it's a family enterprise, which is very friendly and it offers a quality food with reasonable prices and local appetizers.

Poi.Name: Panorama
Poi.Description: ​​More than 20 years of experience in the art of service ensure an enjoyable evening

Poi.Name: Taverna Pyli
Poi.Description: ​Tavern on the central square of Pyli

Poi.Name: Banana's house
Poi.Description: One of the oldest bar's in the village

Poi.Name: Three stars
Poi.Description: ​Three Stars is a beach restaurant with friendly environment, cool breeze and pleasant atmosphere. You can visit it to taste the delicious food and have a nice time.​

Poi.Name: Sunlight
Poi.Description: Desserts,Coffee,Drinks,Sandwiches​

Poi.Name: A la Crepa
Poi.Description: ​Creppe,Sandwiches,Snackw, quality ingredients

Poi.Name: Kardamena's Go Kart
Poi.Description: The first go Kart track in Dodekanese. New Go Kart's and unlimited fun!

Poi.Name: Drosos Cafe
Poi.Description: ​Traditional Cafe​ in Pili Square

Poi.Name: Mithodia
Poi.Description: ​Cafe in the central square of Pili​

Poi.Name: Geronimo
Poi.Description: ​Cafe in St. Georgios in Pili​

Poi.Name: Akropol
Poi.Description: ​Cafeteria in Kamari, Kefalos, on the coastal road. Cafes, Snack, Coctail, pancakes and waffles!​

Poi.Name: Nova Vita
Poi.Description: ​Nova Vita is a veteran solider in the nightlife of Kos isle.Newly renovated its playlists corespond and cater to all musical tastes.The management and staff invite you to its stage no matter the night of the week.

Poi.Name: Sebastian
Poi.Description: Near the wave of the sea in Kamari Kefalos! Variety of very good food, fresh seafood and appetizers!​

Poi.Name: Sunlight
Poi.Description: ​Seaside cafe with good coffee, good service and pleasant atmosphere!​

Poi.Name: Socrates
Poi.Description: Socrates is a family business, in a friendly enviroment. It is open since 1979, with good service, good prices and offers fresh, local products.

Poi.Name: Angelina's House
Poi.Description:
​Angelina's House has very good Greek cuisine, everything cooked on grill. It also serves fresh fish.

It is a family business with good service.

Poi.Name: Grand Cafe - Patiserie
Poi.Description: ​Cafe - Patisserie in Kamari Kefalos with good coffee and home made deserts!

Poi.Name: Hamam
Poi.Description: ​Hamam is an inovation of a nightclub in the nightlife of Kos,having mainted its quality pristine over the years.Hamam is built solely of stone,being the modern manifestation of the Ottoman bath-houses of old, improving its acoustics.The musical style of the club will satisfy even the most demanding,its Djs giving their best every single day.The staff and management welcome you 31 days out of the month to paint  a dreamworld out of every night.Reasonable prices and personal service are its trademark and the most certain gurantee for customer entertainment.

Poi.Name: Blue Horizon
Poi.Description: ​Home made traditional food​

Poi.Name: Mikri Edem
Poi.Description: ​Ouzo, traditional snacks, plenty of wine and raki in the harbor of Kefalos!​

Poi.Name: West
Poi.Description: ​A night club higly popular with foreign guests.In fact its bustling atmosphere necessitated the introduction of a second bar ,an adition quite well thought ,if the operation was to be run smoothly.Its tones run along mainstream pop music and beats.The bar opens when the first visitor plane arrives and closes its doors with the last one to take air.The prices are reasonable and the environment quite friendly.

Poi.Name: Sidney
Poi.Description:
​Sydney Bar is located at Kefalos Bay probably the most beautiful beach in Kos and the most famous one, situated right on the beach.

The friendly staff and the facilities of this ALL DAY BAR, combined with the natural attraction of a traditional Greek island under the Mediterranean sun will make your holidays an unforgettable experience.

Poi.Name: Status Club
Poi.Description:
Status Club situated in the lively resort of Kardamena, Kos. It boasts an electric trouble free holiday atmosphere, seven nights a week. It has a loyal and appreciated following of workers and tourists. Due to the clubs interior our amazing DJs command the venue from an elevated position to take full control so you can’t resist having the night of your life.

The club puts every consideration into the music played, it's DJs are dedicated to banging out whatever sounds keep the dance floor bouncing. It has three contrasting DJ’s on rotation every night thus promising you a unique clubbing experience.

Poi.Name: Afrodite
Poi.Description: ​Restaurant in Kamari Kefalos from 1981, Traditional Greek cuisine, beautiful sea views and a laid back attitude! ​

Poi.Name: Sarai Club
Poi.Description:
Sarai Club is a club with an emphasis on Greek music. For those who want something tried and tested, Sarai is a place they must visit.
Open every night.

Poi.Name: B52
Poi.Description: ​Cafeteria in Kamari, Kefalos, Fun and peaceful atmosphere!​

Poi.Name: Platanos Restaurant Coffee Bar
Poi.Description:
​Platanos Restaurant opened on 1979 in the historical Platanos square, between the perennial Hippocrates tree, Lotzias mosque, the Italian headquarter and the ancient agora. It has been accommodated in an old Italian building of 1935's that during the Italian domination used to be, Officers Club and it has been renovated recently.
From early in the morning on the ancient agora view side, long drinks, coffees and sweets are served. On the other part where you can see Hippocrates tree you can taste dishes, always based on fresh raw materials, seafood, meat and vegetables from our Mediterranean and Greek creative kitchen.
Kitchen opens from 12 o'clock in the evening for lunch. During the night you can enjoy your dinner except downstairs also on the ‘’secret balcony’’ with the panoramic view of ancient Agora and Neratzia Castle. Dinner is served accompanied by live music. Except dinner you can enjoy till late your drink or a cocktail always with the quality that Platanos is known about .

Poi.Name: Upstairs Club
Poi.Description: ​Club Upstairs is located in the heart of Kos. With its three dance floors, as many bars and the big outdoor terrace, this nightclub is considered as the best in Kos and famous all across Europe.

Poi.Name: White Corner
Poi.Description: ​For fun until the morning, White Corner is one of your first choices. Music that elevates your mood and plenty of drinks in an environment ideal for clubbing.

Poi.Name: Saloon Tex
Poi.Description: ​Nightclub in Bar Street of Kos. International pop rock music, with entertainment until the morning

Poi.Name: Orange Camelot
Poi.Description: ​Orange Camelot is located in the Bar Street of Kos, where the nightlife is a way of life. Camelot is the place where the party reaches its peak!

Poi.Name: Wild Bull Bar
Poi.Description:
Wild Bull started from a family and opened the 6th of June 2000.
There are 4 brothers, Vasili, Vayos, Kostas and Jorgos and one sister Nectaria. All of them are working in this bar. Vasili, Vayos are outside and Jorgos is inside of the bar.

Their way of thinking is: first they want to make friends and these friends are going to be customers. The customers they had this summer, all said that they liked it so much because they felt that they came to a very warm family. Everybody felt very comfortable in their bar and that is exactly what the family want.

Poi.Name: X Club
Poi.Description:
Famous for so many years now, The No 1 night spot on the island of Kos. Right in the centre of Kos Town, the club has recently been revamped with even more style and taste. Under new management and certainly the hottest place in Town right now! Party with celebrities, dance with the stars!

Have some fun, groove to the latest sounds and best beats. Enjoy the ultimate clubbing experience. Pure quality, including the alcohol,security and safety measures that are taken to ensure all our guests have a top night out, and an unforgettable experience.

Poi.Name: Kyttaro Club
Poi.Description:
If your looking for a great, stylish and happening place then Kyttaro Club is the place for you! Situated in the Famous Bar Street you can guarantee a night of energy and fun.

Kyttaro Club is the trendy place to be on bar street Kos , with amazing music, lighting and activities you are sure to stay until the early hours of the morning. The energy and buzz of Kyttaro Club is unmatchable and with customers from all over the world frequenting the bar, the atmosphere is electric.

Poi.Name: B-52 Cocktail Bar
Poi.Description: Have a great time in B52 Bar - one of Kos best party bar´s. Just have a few drinks or cocktails and relax in our lounge or dance the whole night long.....

Poi.Name: Flintstones Bar
Poi.Description: ​Flinstones is a bar that offers nice cocktails and drinks and it is for friends and for friends of friends. Cute and cozy, but...crazy. If you go there you will find out by yourself.

Poi.Name: Russia
Poi.Description: Traditional Russian restaurant with sea food and grill.​

Poi.Name: Four Roses
Poi.Description:
The Four Roses Club has something for everyone. It is the perfect place to sit outside and watch the world go by with a view of the Aegean Sea whilst enjoying great music played by the resident and international Dj’s. And when it is time you can move inside to the air conditioned nightclub and dance the night away.

There are different sections of the Club. The outside seating and bar area where you can relax and listen music or the inside club where you can dance the night away!

Poi.Name: Qube Club
Poi.Description: With the best Greek music and lots of drinks, at Qube club you have the chance to have fun till early in the morning.

Poi.Name: Caramela Club
Poi.Description: ​Caramela Club is located in Kefalos and organizes Greek and foreign nights.​

Poi.Name: Orange Snack Bar
Poi.Description: ​Beautiful cafeteria in Kefalos with breathtaking harbor view! Good coffee and pleasant mood!​

Poi.Name: Wave resataurant
Poi.Description: ​Fresh seafood, traditional Greek cuisine, next to the sea shore!​

Poi.Name: Rainbow
Poi.Description: Beach restaurant with excellent cuisine by a professional chef!​

Poi.Name: Starlight
Poi.Description:
Starlight first opened its doors back in 1981. It was originally an open air 80s disco venue, hence the name!
Over the years Starlight has grown in size and popularity and is now Kardamenas biggest club and the No 1 hotspot!

In high season Starlight is full of 1000 clubbers up for a good time. Over 100,000 people each summer visit Starlight, make sure you are one of them!

Poi.Name: Avantaz Club
Poi.Description: ​If you want to feel the Greek enterteinment, then Avantaz is the right choice for you. With Greek music, avantaz is the ultimate Greek club!

Poi.Name: Downtown Club
Poi.Description: ​The most fun club located in Kos Kardamena. The club is open all night. It offers great cocktails and the music plays till the early hours.

Poi.Name: Baya Beach
Poi.Description:
​Beach bar - restaurant.

Sun-beds - Umbrellas,

Beach Volley.

Various Games,

Beer Pong,

Backgammon,

Friendly enviroment,

Plesant staff,

Hand made food.

Poi.Name: Vertatoria Snack-Bar Restaurant
Poi.Description: ​Wonderful sea view, homemade traditional Greek cuisine and local delicacies as well as excellent pizza!​

Poi.Name: Fikos Bar
Poi.Description: ​As you sit under the shade of Fikos tree, relax, whilst viewing the harbour and enjoying the delicious foods, coffees and drinks Fikos Bar offers.

Poi.Name: Del Porto
Poi.Description:
​The "Del Porto" (restaurant - cafe) is situated in the center of Kos harbour, facing the sea and the dolphins fountain.

The dishes are all freshly made of high quality produce and are excellent to hte taste.

Freshly home - made desserts, the friendly and professional service personel will comply to your every wish.

The cuisine is open 24/7.

Come to the "Del Porto" and it will open the doors to a unique experience speaking English, Tirkish, Dutch, Russian, Hebrew.

Poi.Name: Koako
Poi.Description: ​Open since 1978, Koako offers catering services with emphasis on Greek and mainly local cuisine, with fresh, daily home cooked dish, fish and meat from Kos.

Poi.Name: Plaza
Poi.Description: ​Plaza offers excellent cuisine on the searfront, since 1987. It offers Greek and International cuisine and seabeds on the beach. All this, with perfect service.

Poi.Name: Opa Opa
Poi.Description: Cocktail Bar by the beach, delicious snacks during the day, and amazing cocktail for memorable nights with relaxation and fun!

Poi.Name: Pizza Con
Poi.Description:
In Pizza Con they use only the freshest and finest ingredients. The staff is highly trained to deliver the best of everything.
Try Creampie from Serres or choose from the exotic Asian choices, enjoy a delicious pizza and do not forget to try pizza in a cone. The pasta will tempt you.
Following the philosophy to always deliver the best, we combine delicious old and new tastes, gathered from various cuisines from around the world to create a unique flavor that will make you come back for more.
So if your looking for something special, something more, if you are looking for fast food but not junk, then Pizza Con is the place to be.

Poi.Name: Hirodion
Poi.Description: Family tavern that operates the last 30 years in the island of Kos. It offers Greek and International cuisine.

Poi.Name: Galini
Poi.Description: ​Restaurant in Kamari Kefalos with full of flavor, exemplary service and great atmosphere! It offers Greek and Oriental cuisine and fresh seafood!​

Poi.Name: Olympia
Poi.Description: ​Olympia restaurant offers Greek cuisine, 20 meters from the sea and has very friendly personel. It is located near the city center.

Poi.Name: Tarzan Pasalimani restaurant
Poi.Description:
On Tarzan Beach, apart from the very nice food and beautiful beach, Tarzan makes his own show and makes the world go crazy! Twice a week you can enjoy live music and every Wednesday you can have fun at the watermellon party.
In the restaurant you will find traditional cuisine and ethnic dishes.

Poi.Name: Fytorio Taverna
Poi.Description: ​Traditional tavern on the provincial road Kos - Kefalos, just outside the village of Kefalos! Traditional cuisine, fresh atmosphere and pleasant mood!​

Poi.Name: Blue Ocean
Poi.Description: ​Kos has a lot of quality restaurants. Taverna Blue Ocean in Psalidi beach area is one of them. A beautiful setting, with a decked area right by the sea. Excellent service from going in to leaving.

Poi.Name: Marina Cafe
Poi.Description: ​The cafe Marina is unique. And it is unique because it is the only cafe inside the beautiful Marina of Kos,with great atmosphere, next to the yachts. It offers a variety of coffees but also drinks, cocktails and snacks.

Poi.Name: Blue Phoenix
Poi.Description: ​At Akti Zouroudi, where the beach is full of life, you will find Blue Phoenix. It has sea view, service and quality food production, things that you will appreciate when you are on holidays.

Poi.Name: Artemis Heaven
Poi.Description:
Sun! sea! Sand! In the largest sandy beach of Kos!
There lies Heaven Artemis Beach Bar to make you travel to it's own world.
The pillows and hammocks are caring for your own comfort and all this under chill out sounds, perfect for your relaxation.
Coffee, drinks and cocktails offer you refreshing breaths and the dive into the sea come one after the other.
Open every day throughout the summer, from early morning till late at night, for coffee, drinks, tropical coctails and light meals overlooking the sea. A magnificent scenery accompanied by the chill out sounds.
Heaven Artemis Beach Bar offers to its customers sea beds and umbrellas on the beach, accompanied by the cafe bar services.
Beach volley tournaments with maximum adrenalin.
Heaven Artemis Beach Bar hosts parties, happenings and live shows with the best bands and the best DJs.
All the personnel of the business is always at reach to offer you the best services for this place, this hours you will share with them to be left unforgettable.

Poi.Name: Camel Bar
Poi.Description:
Camel Bar is famous all over the world for its unique and great atmosphere and it's friendy service! Thousands of visitors enjoy their holidays in Kos and especially in Camel Bar every year.

The target is always to be one step ahead! Since 1997 they strive to offer the best in quality entertainment.

Through the years Camel Bar has always developed and expanded in giving it's customers the very best. Today Camel is the biggest Bar in Kos town and it have also created it's own restaurant which has grown to be one of the most successful restaurants in Kos, namely "De Haven" Cafe-Restaurant.

Camel Bar and De Haven Restaurant guarantee you the highest quality in service. Their aim is for their guests to enjoy their stay at the establishments with the most beautiful view of the harbour of Kos island.

Poi.Name: G. Plaza
Poi.Description: ​G. Plaza offers pizza, pasta, waffles, breakfast, fresh meat every day. It also has Gyros and kebab.

Poi.Name: XL Cafe
Poi.Description: ​XL Cafe is a place you can relax and enjoy your drinks. It offers a wide variety of cocktails in the busy street of Kanari.

Poi.Name: Kartoulis
Poi.Description: ​Family run bussiness with excellent food in the village of Kefalos! The meats are locally produced and the food is homemade!

Poi.Name: Zenith
Poi.Description: ​Cafeteria in the center of the village of Kefalos. Serving coffees, drinks and pies! Broadcasts matches from around the world.

Poi.Name: Srtand Cafee
Poi.Description:
​The Strand Cafe Restaurant is located in the center of Kos. It can serve around 500 people every day because it has sun beds with umbrellas.
The kitchen serves Greek and Scandinavian food. The atmosphere and friendly service is above all in this family environment. A family business that respects it's fellows.

Poi.Name: Alberto
Poi.Description: ​Alberto Restaurant Grill House is a well known restaurant not only to the foreigns but to the locals too. This beautiful restaurant opened in 2012 right on the sea front. With a beautiful view of the aegean sea you can dine, with a variety of fresh meat made on grill and fresh fish, waiting for you. It has an extensive menu full of delicious plates. Alberto opens early in the morning and closes late at night.

Poi.Name: Caravelle
Poi.Description: ​Caravelle is a restaurant that serves Greek and foreign people. It is located near the sea and offers Greek cuisine and sea food. It's open all the year and awaits you to enjoy it's nice atmosphere and delicious food.

Poi.Name: O Kafes
Poi.Description: ​Central traditional cafeteria in the village of Kefalos with very good coffee and friendly service! The cafeteria is open all year round!​

Poi.Name: Sole Mare
Poi.Description: ​With comfortable, modern rooms, pleasant and cool evnironment for enjoyable moments near the sea. It offers fine Italian cuisine, chill out music, cocktails, savory pancakes, waffles, ice cream and good mood.

Poi.Name: Kapsoulis
Poi.Description: ​Pizzeria in the village of Kefalos! Fresh pizza with homemade dough, pancakes, waffles and pies! Pleasant atmosphere and friendly service!

Poi.Name: Tsipouradiko by Thalia
Poi.Description: Tsipouradiko by Thalia is a traditional meze restaurant near Dolphin fountain of Kos. In a nice atmosphere, you will enjoy the food and have fun to the sounds of Greek music.

Poi.Name: The Wolve's Nest
Poi.Description: ​The Wolve's Nest is famiy run taverna with open kitchen,  lovely dishes at a good price, nice atmosphere and calm releaxed friendly people,

Poi.Name: Eleytherias Square Cafe
Poi.Description: Elytherias Square is located in a perfect location in the center of Kos, where you can enjoy your coffee while admiring the history of Kos through its buildings.

Poi.Name: X-Ray
Poi.Description: ​X-ray is in the village of Kefalos, it has very good service and offers delicious crepes, pizzas and snacks.

Poi.Name: Godimento Cafe
Poi.Description: A cafe at Kefalos village, which you can visit Winter and Summer, since it is open all year.

Poi.Name: Psarovarka
Poi.Description: ​Psarovarka is a fish tavern near the sea, with fresh fish and mezes, everything home made.

Poi.Name: Sunrise of the East
Poi.Description: ​A restaurant in Kefalos, near the beach, with asian cuisine.

Poi.Name: Antonios Taverna
Poi.Description: ​A restaurant in Kefalos, near the beach, with Greek and International cuisine and seafood.

Poi.Name: To Kompologaki
Poi.Description: Kompologaki is a traditional tavern in the provincial road, just outside the village of Kefalos.

Poi.Name: Markos Beach
Poi.Description: Restaurant in Markos Beach. Wonderful view of the sea, wonderful food and fresh sea food. What more can someone want?

Poi.Name: Ifestos
Poi.Description: ​Restaurant in the village of Tigaki with very good Greek cuisine, fresh seafood and international cuisine!​

Poi.Name: Katerina
Poi.Description:
​One of the most famous restaurants in Kefalos, the tavern "Katerina" began operating in 1987. It is a family business in Agios Stefanos beach and in the menu you will find delicious Greek varieties of flavors.

Katerina and the people who work with her wish you to enjoy their flavors and have a good appetite.

Poi.Name: Perros Konstantinos
Poi.Description: ​Traditional cafe on the way to Kefalos.

Poi.Name: Magic Beach
Poi.Description: ​A restaurant with panoramic views of the bay of Kefalos and the island of Nisyros. Characterized by mama's kitchen and has local meat and oil locally produced.

Poi.Name: Camel
Poi.Description: ​Camel restaurant offers a wide variety of shells, fresh fish and seafood, with a panoramic view of the head.

Poi.Name: Zephyros
Poi.Description: ​Fresh fish and seafood is what characterizes Zephyr restaurant with a nice view of the bay of Kefalos.

Poi.Name: Nick's Restaurant Beach Bar
Poi.Description:
Nicks restaurant beach bar is located in the main beach of Kos since 1983, it’s a family place with nice and friendly atmosphere where  you can taste the local and Greek cuisine. Everything is homemade from Nicks wife Eva and all this with admiring the wonderful sea view.
Nicks restaurant in the day time is a beach bar too, where you can spent a lousy day laying on the sun beds and having your snacks , cocktails,  deserts and many more.
NICKS RESTAURANT BEACH BAR IS THE PLACE TO BE, YES PLEASE...

Poi.Name: Dolphin Rock Cafe
Poi.Description: Dolphin Rock Cafe is a Rock Cafe with large TVs for live sports and it has a swimming pool, snacks, a variety of drinks, cocktails and special coffees.

Poi.Name: Plori Restaurant
Poi.Description: ​Seaside taverna in the village of Tigaki! Fresh fish and seafood, traditional Greek cuisine and great atmosphere!​

Poi.Name: Kastri
Poi.Description:
In Kastri, the tables are neat and the chef is ready to embrace you with flavours and aromas of Kefalos. For Kastri, the food evokes sentiment. The song and the passion of Greece culture in contained in the food Kastri offers.

The quality and the flavour in Kastri restaurant is a signature of it's hospitality. Food is exclusively dressed with Greek ingredients for two generations now, maintaining the tradition of the restaurant. Therefore taste Kastri's memorable traditional starters, meat on the grill, tasty sauses, craved salads and fresh fish.

Poi.Name: Melody
Poi.Description: ​Cafe Melody is a family business with a pleasant atmosphere that serves coffees and drinks. It is ideal for relaxation and rest.

Poi.Name: Syrtaki
Poi.Description: ​Syrtaki offers nice food near the beach. Lamb, fresh fish and seafood are some of the dishes you'll find there. All food, including the bread and cheese, is homemade and all made from the hands of Mrs. Joanna!

Poi.Name: Kampos
Poi.Description: ​Kampos is a family business in Kampos of Kefalos with tradition since 1987. It offers traditional cuisine and fresh seafood.

Poi.Name: Deliziare
Poi.Description: ​Italian cuisine with fresh pizzas on the main road of Kefalos.

Poi.Name: Memory Cafe
Poi.Description: ​The Melody is a cafeteria in Kamari, Kefalos. In an atmosphere that relaxes you, you can enjoy your coffee or your beer.

Poi.Name: Manos Fast Food
Poi.Description: ​Manos offers very good quality fast food. You can find there hamburgers, club sandwiches, gyros and much more.

Poi.Name: Gosia
Poi.Description: The Gosia is situated in Kefalos, in a nice and quiet place. What characterizes Gosia, are the huge and delicious dishes, that is not to mention the restaurant staff , who offers excellent hospitality to the guest.

Poi.Name: The Sunburnt Arms
Poi.Description:
Best English breakfast in town.

Don't forget Bingo and Quiz nights.

​Don't miss Sunday Roast.

Free sunbeds.

Free WiFi.

Poi.Name: Konstantinos Politis Snack Bar
Poi.Description: ​A small café in Kefalos.It offers an excellent breakfast, with fresh ingredients and homemade burgers.

Poi.Name: Flamengo Cafe Bar
Poi.Description: ​Cafe at Kefalos Kamari.

Poi.Name: Maria's Bar
Poi.Description: ​Maria's Bar is located in Kamari, Kefalos and it is an historic shop, being open since 1978. It offers coffee, drinks and snacks.

Poi.Name: Paradise Beach
Poi.Description: ​At the beautiful beach of Kefalos Paradise, you will also find  Paradise restaurant. In a very nice location and with a nice view of the beach, you can enjoy Greek, International cuisine and seafood. Otherwise you can have a drink or beer in the bar beside it.

Poi.Name: Faros
Poi.Description:
​The traditional restaurant Faros is a real fish tavern and one of the first fish restaurants in Kefalos, Kamari area. In addition to fresh fish (no cheap frozen or aquaculture fish) squid, octopus, lobster, mussels and shrimps are served.

Of course, you can also enjoy meat dishes, vegetables in different variations, traditional oven cooked dishes, vegetarian dishes, salads and desserts. We offer various dishes from our charcoal grill. A very extensive range of starters completes the dishes.

Poi.Name: Kamares
Poi.Description: ​Cafeteria Kamares is ideally positioned in Kamari, Kefalos, next to the sea. It is traditional and serves coffees, drinks and snacks.

Poi.Name: Santa Barbara Restaurant
Poi.Description: ​Santa Barbara restaurant is located in Kamari, Kefalos, with spectacular views of the bay of Kamari. It offers Greek, Italian and International cuisine and what characterizes it is that everything is cooked real charcoal. It also offers traditional bread from Kefalos.

Poi.Name: Stamatia
Poi.Description: Αληθινή ψησταριά με πραγματικά κάρβουνα, φρέσκα ψάρια, θαλασσινά αλλά και κρέατα είναι αυτά που προσφέρει το εστιατόριο Σταματία. Θα το βρείτε στο Καμάρι της Κεφάλου.

Poi.Name: Captain John
Poi.Description: ​A beachfront tavern on the square of Kamari in Kefalos. Overlooking the bay of Kefalos, it offers very good homemade food in a cool breeze.

Poi.Name: Maria Tavern
Poi.Description: Tavern Maria is a family business by the sea, with room for parking. It offers fresh meats and fish along with fresh traditional bread they make themselves.

Poi.Name: Mavromatis
Poi.Description:
The tavern Mavromatis operated for 55 years in the wonderful Psalidi Kos.

After three generations of owners remains intact with very high quality of dishes, you can choose from a wide variety of our menu.

They use freshest vegetables, Greek local meats and fresh fish is always a full day in a friendly and hospitable environment literally on the beach where you can enjoy your food and Greek music.

The owners guarantee the most memorable dining experience.

Poi.Name: Cavos
Poi.Description: ​In Kamari, Kefalos, next to the sea, you will find the restaurant Cavos. It offers Greek cuisine and seafood.

Poi.Name: Hippocrates
Poi.Description: ​Hippocrates restaurant is located on the main street of Kefalos and offers fresh pizza, pasta and traditional Greek dishes.

Poi.Name: Fresko Gelateria
Poi.Description: ​Fresko is located in Kos town next to the bus station. For quick and enjoyble food, pancakes and waffles Fresko is a very good choice. It also has ice cream it's own production.

Poi.Name: Sun Light
Poi.Description:
​Many snacks, Waffles and home made crepes.

Cocktails from a bartender with 35 years of experience.

Poi.Name: Plaza
Poi.Description: ​Beautiful seaside restaurant since 1987 with Greek and international cuisine, sunbeds and perfect service.

Poi.Name: Sebastian 2
Poi.Description: ​Sebastian 2 has been with you for the past 20 years,unfailingly lighting up your evenings and late nights with expertly made coctails,swift and discreet but personal service and the untimely uniqueness that the bar is known and renowned for.

Poi.Name: Zona Club
Poi.Description:
​ZONA CLUB welcomes you to the ultimate nightlife experience! Crazy nights of live
music events, mainstream sounds and dance music until the early morning hours.
Choose from a great variety of alcoholic drinks and stylish cocktails and move to the
rhythm of our Dj set all night long!
On the main road of Psalidi area, next to Kipriotis Hippocrates Hotel.

Poi.Name: ​Red Loft Bar
Poi.Description: ​RED LOFT BAR is an impressive lounge espresso bar, located on the 7th floor of Kipriotis Panorama Hotel & Suites. Chic and fashionable, is the perfect location to sip quality cocktails while enjoying the captivating panoramic view and the astonishing diving of the sun into the magnificent deep blue of the Aegean Sea.

Poi.Name: Sun Rise
Poi.Description: ​Sun Rise is open from the summer of 1995, with many faithful customers. the restaurant uses mostly local products. Family business with sea view.

Poi.Name: Yatch Cafe Inn
Poi.Description:
​Yatch cafe Inn is a sea side cafe with fantastic view.

It offers perfect service in a quiet and nice environment.

You can enjoy your coffee or drink and try some of the delicious snacks it offers.

Poi.Name: Al Dente
Poi.Description:
​Al Dente is located in a very nice area, near the beach overlooking the sea.
The cuisine is excellent and you will definitely enjoy the food and your visit there.

Poi.Name: Cafe Classic
Poi.Description: ​Cafe Classic, Resataurant, Coctail bar. The right choise!

Poi.Name: Nestoras
Poi.Description:
​Nestoras is a very nice restaurant by the sea. It has a tradition in greek cuisine and is prefered by both Greeks and foreigners alike.
During your vacation do not miss the chance to visit it.

Poi.Name: Ταβέρνα Barbas
Poi.Description:
​Barbas tavern is operating for 30 years and has Greek and cooked cuisine.
In a very nice atmosphere you can enjoy your food.

Poi.Name: Socrates
Poi.Description:
​Since 2001.

Tradition in roast.

Delivery at your place.

Fresh, local meat.

Poi.Name: Lithino
Poi.Description: ​Very good Greek cuisine, family business. Friendly environment! Open daily. It features live music several times a month. Very nice appetizers and traditional dishes, fresh fish and meats. Enjoy ouzo with meze and whatever else you prefer

Poi.Name: Gin's Place
Poi.Description: ​Very nice greek and eastern cousine. Family bussines and pleasant enviroment.

Poi.Name: Agora
Poi.Description: ​The restaurant "Agora" is located in the center of the city, behind the main "Platia Eleytherias" and the Municipal Market. In the square of Agia Paraskevi where it is located, you can enjoy your meal or drink under 4 beautiful and huge sycamore trees, aged about 80 years. The coolness of the trees can make your stay at this place very pleasant, and with the quality of the food combined, you can spend two fantastic and unforgettable hours.

Poi.Name: Arap
Poi.Description:
Arap is a Restaurant that since 1955 keeps the tradition with greek and turkish dishes, like kebabs, vegetables and grilled meat.

You can find it at Platani square.

Poi.Name: Kaza Cafe Bar
Poi.Description:
​Multiplex with many exhibitions (Photograph, handmade jewelry, painting, book exchange, large range of game boards)
Musical events, charity events and event hosting.
Classic Italian building with pleasant surroundings, excellent service whether it is food or drink, from early in the morning till late at night.
And always with low prices.

Poi.Name: Hasan Restaurant
Poi.Description:
Hasan​ restaurant has a wide variety of kebab like:
Kebabs.
Adana kebab.
Tavouklou kebabs.
Lachmatzoun handmade.
Meatballs.

Poi.Name: Acropolis
Poi.Description:
The best pizza in kos town.

Good service and serves coffee too.

Delivery from 06:00 - 00:00

Poi.Name: Broadway
Poi.Description:
Broadway is a restaurant in the town of Kos. In a very nice area you can enjoy some of the nice dishes that offers, either at nght or at noon after a tiresome day.
If you ask where is the best restaurant in Kos, it is likely to show you the way there!

Poi.Name: Ladokola
Poi.Description: ​Nice atmosphere with very good food! Traditional family tavern. Spit and all kinds of snacks…​

Poi.Name: Grill House "Andreas"
Poi.Description:
​Grill house "Andreas" offers quality food in very reasonable prices.

Fresh meat, gyros and kontosouvli are some of the dishes you can find there.

Poi.Name: Da Luz
Poi.Description:
​The new hot spot in the center of Kos.
Nice atmosphere, the best coffee in the perfect location, friendly service and beautiful faces ...
Enjoy your morning coffee watching the people passing by and feel the vitality of the center of Kos.
Also enjoy your evening drink with the sounds of DJ, playing all the latest hits or even classic timeless songs.

Poi.Name: Gin's Corner
Poi.Description: ​Gin's Corner is a traditional cafe in the village of Platani, with nice surroundings and fresh handmade desserts.

Poi.Name: Jumbo Style
Poi.Description:
​Traditional greek cuisine.

Gyros, pizza, pasta, salads, burgers, seafood, snacks, breakfasts.

Poi.Name: Fuego music cafe
Poi.Description: ​Nargilehs with 20 different flavors of tobacco! The shop has 12 laptops for free use by the customers.​

Poi.Name: Konstantinoypoli
Poi.Description:
Traditional tastes by Nikos Sourasis.​

Delivery 12:00 - 00:00.

Poi.Name: Hot Dog Onion
Poi.Description:
Hot Dog with 5 different flavors for sausage and 6 for onion.
Delivery 12:00 - 00:00.

Poi.Name: Honey & Cinnamon
Poi.Description:
​Honey & Cinnamon offers fresh, traditional donuts along with honey, nuts, chocolate and ice cream.

It also offers crepes in very low prices and various coffes.

Poi.Name: Tavraki Sports Pub
Poi.Description: ​Tavraki sports Pub can provide you with over 1000 sports channels of your favourite sports and over 300 of the latest movies! Friendly enviroment and good service!

Poi.Name: Free Time Restaurant
Poi.Description:
​Free Time is a restaurant which offers fine Greek cuisine and fast food.

Located in kanari, a central and busy street of Kos.

Poi.Name: Frozen Corner
Poi.Description: Forzen yogurt shop.

Poi.Name: Sardelles
Poi.Description:
​Tavern with an emphasis on traditional and local cuisine.
Foods for special categories: vegetarian, meat eaters etc.
Local products are used like honey, vegetables and olive oil.

Poi.Name: Harem
Poi.Description: ​ Dressed in the colors of Anatolia HAREM is located by the sea with Oriental and Greek cuisine. Ready to satisfy every culinary desire of the most demandings ! You can smoke Nargile with more than 10 different flavors. Enjoy cold beers, refreshing cocktails, traveling to the sounds of your favorite music until late at night!

Poi.Name: Le Cafe
Poi.Description: ​Le Café is an all day café bar on the beach of Vas. Georgiou. From morning to night, it is a meeting place for all ages who enjoy great coffee brand Portioli, pastries, light meals and drinks in a pleasant and comfortable environment, with the unique view of the sea keeping the leading role.

Poi.Name: Prepon
Poi.Description:
Restaurant Café Bistro “Prepon” is situated next to Kos most visited area,the old market. Beside the church of “Agia Paraskevi”, a bedrock square with numerous guests walking through every day and night.

 Below the beautiful trees, experience their local delights combined with special service. Our philosophy is to highlight the local products through simplicity and quality.

 All day long, starting early in the morning with refreshments till late in the night with splendid food and deserts. They expect you to leave having with you the flavours of the island’s culture.

Welcome at ‘’Prepon’.

Poi.Name: Oromedon
Poi.Description:
​Since 1997 in Zia, operates a very nice tavern called OROMEDON. As the years went by, it made it's own history in good traditional dishes.
There is an extensive menu with traditional recipes.

Poi.Name: Asfendiou Tavern
Poi.Description: ​The tavern Asfendiou is a beautiful, traditional tavern in the square of Asomatos. You can find traditional dishes and appetizers while enjoying the wonderful view.

Poi.Name: Roof Garden
Poi.Description:
​The Roof Garden is a family restaurant with mom's cooking. It has, as the name says, a Roof Garden, and very nice view of the sunset!
Located in the center of the village of Zia, if you visit you will definitely feel the friendly atmosphere of the restaurant.

Poi.Name: Watermill of Zia
Poi.Description:
Watermill of Zia is located in an old restored water mill where it now operates as a traditional cafe.
The site of the old water mill is open to customers.
The cafe has a very nice view and relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

Poi.Name: Sunset Balcony
Poi.Description: Sunset Restaurant is a traditional family tavern which operates 33 years in the village of Zia. It has the best sunset view and spectacular views of the Aegean and Minor Asia, with traditional dishes and delicacies.

Poi.Name: Taverna Zia
Poi.Description:
​Tavern Zia is located at the top of Zia.
It offers a very nice view and very good food in a pleasant atmosphere.

Poi.Name: The Village Tavern
Poi.Description:
​Greek mezes - souvlaki.

Mix Grills - gyros and kids menu.

Poi.Name: Dikaios Tavern
Poi.Description: Dikaios tavern offers traditional dishes, traditional lamb, fresh meats and very good wine in a nice environment.

Poi.Name: Olympia
Poi.Description:
Olympia ​Tavern is located at the foot of "Oromedonta", the only mountain in Kos!
Through the pines and fir trees overlooking the vast sea with its crystal clear waters of the Aegean, and dozens of islands and islets that "swim inside her"!
Enjoy the sunset while drinking your coffee or your red or white - sweet or dry chilled glass of local wine produced in Kos!

Poi.Name: Kostas
Poi.Description: ​With them you will find quality, clean and beautiful enviroment and good prices. Because they love their jobs. The only thing left is to find out by yourselves.

Poi.Name: Olympia 2
Poi.Description:
​Olympia 2 ​Tavern is located at the foot of "Oromedonta", the only mountain in Kos!
Through the pines and fir trees overlooking the vast sea with its crystal clear waters of the Aegean, and dozens of islands and islets that "swim inside her"!
Enjoy the sunset while drinking your coffee or your red or white - sweet or dry chilled glass of local wine produced in Kos!

Poi.Name: Barcode
Poi.Description:
Barcode is a cafeteria at the end of Zipari.
It offers very nice coffe and snacks.

Poi.Name: Minima
Poi.Description: Minima serves roasted speciality espresso, at the central street of Zipari.​

Poi.Name: Aegean
Poi.Description: ​Very good food in a traditional charcoal grill! Greek stews and traditional cuisine!​

Poi.Name: Sunset
Poi.Description: ​Great view by the sea! Billiards table soccer and​ computers!​

Poi.Name: Biggys on the beach
Poi.Description: ​Biggys is a family buisness since 1996! It serves illy coffe by the beach and wonderfull cappuccino. It also serves breakfast and lunch with fresh loccel produce

Poi.Name: Artemis
Poi.Description: ​The Artemis is next to the beach, features live music and good service! The dishes offered are very good! Fresh fish and meat.

Poi.Name: Borsalino
Poi.Description: ​Centrally situated, the Borsalino Cafe is open from 10.00 until late serving a variety of coffees, cocktails, beers, soft drinks, ice-cream and anything else that you might like depending on the time of day!

Poi.Name: Chill Out
Poi.Description:
​Chill out is a very nice cafe shop in Mastihari, with nice coffee and friendly staff.

You can go there to chill out and rest after a very tiresome day

Poi.Name: Museum
Poi.Description:
In a nice environment Apostolis and his professional staff guarantee a perfect dinner-evening.
After your first visit here, you will sure want to come back here.

If it is too cold or too hot to sit outsite, you can also sit inside with air-conditioning.
The kitchen is well-organised and they are working by the HCCAP-certificate.

Museum is frequently visited by tourists as well as Greeks. To avoid being disappointed you better make a reservation if you want to have dinner, especially in high-season.

​

Poi.Name: Kenny's
Poi.Description: Kenny's is a restaurant at Mastihari that offers both fast food and grilled meat.​

Poi.Name: Kibotos
Poi.Description: ​Coctail bar in downtown TIGAKI, near the square. Features large tv screens for viewing football games, billiards and various games! Nice Coctails, pleasant atmosphere and good service!

Poi.Name: Harama
Poi.Description:
​Harama is a restaurant in Mastihari, with nice atmosphere and friendly staff.
It serves Greek and international cuisine.

Poi.Name: Vios
Poi.Description:
A family run business which mixes traditional stone walls and a admirable wooden bar,  with luxurious leather sofa’s and a large screen TV for those special events, (and football matches).

The pizza’s are superb, home baked base with plenty of toppings to choose from, and homemade sauces.  Choose from a range of different types including calzone, and stuffed crust pizza and pasta too. (Take away,  and delivery service available to your accommodation).

Poi.Name: Taka Taka Mam
Poi.Description: ​The restaurant is situated in the center of TIGAKI, near the square since 1989! It's a family business with very good food, good service and reasonable prices!​

Poi.Name: Tasos the Kalymnian
Poi.Description:
​Tasos the Kalymnian offers fresh seafood and shellfish that catch by themselves, overlooking the port of Mastichari.
Affordable prices in an enjoyable atmosphere.

Poi.Name: Kalymnos by Periklis
Poi.Description: ​Traditional tavern with view of Mastihari port.

Poi.Name: Tigaki
Poi.Description: Restaurant in downtown Tigaki with sea view! Very good food with great variety of dishes! Excellent service and friendly atmosphere.​

Poi.Name: Nostos
Poi.Description: ​The building were Nostos is, was built in 1926 and was the first building of the settlement. Originally used as a winery , it then was turned into a tavern and now features traditional cuisine and seafood of all kinds.

Poi.Name: Aktogiali
Poi.Description:
​Akrogiali offers traditional dishes, Greek cuisine and fresh fish by the sea.
You can enjoy your food under the sunset, at very affordable prices.

Poi.Name: Fidelio
Poi.Description: Fidelio is a traditional restraurant, opposite of the ancient market. A family business with traditional greek and sea food.

Poi.Name: Traditional Restaurant
Poi.Description: ​Family restaurant that has it's own products from his garden, with a very nice view of the sea and all this, in a cool environment.

Poi.Name: Ioannis Palapanis
Poi.Description: ​Cafeteria - Bakery on the main road of Tigaki

Poi.Name: Aplo Beach Bar
Poi.Description:
Leaving the village Mastichari, at 300 meters opposite the Church Evagelistria emerges the "APLO" beach bar.

Particularly in the evening hours where the color of the sunset fills the yard, are enchanting.
Each room has been studied to the smallest detail, and each corner is different.
Both the simplicity and magic of nature, gains the trust of the visitor immediately, who can not help but feel like home.
Ideal for families who want to enjoy the beach and at the same time enjoy the snacks at  "APLO" beach bar.
Open daily from 10:30 am until late at night with music, snacks, spectacular views to the sea and the beautiful sunset.

Poi.Name: El Greco
Poi.Description: ​El Greco is located near the sea, under the amazing sunset with a really good couisine.

Poi.Name: Mavros
Poi.Description: ​Traditional greek couisine near the sea.

Poi.Name: Horizon Coffee Bar
Poi.Description: ​Horizon coffee Bar is located at the beach of Mastihari in a perfect location. There, you can enjoy your coffee or your drink before or after your swim in the sea.

Poi.Name: Palatiano
Poi.Description:
​Palatiano is a traditional tavern where you can enjoy your meal overlooking the sea.
It offers nice Greek, Mediterranean and international cuisine.

Poi.Name: Majestic
Poi.Description: ​Majestic. a beach bar at Mastihari. In a nice environment and good atmosphere, someone can enjoy his coffee or his drink during the sunny day.

Poi.Name: Kali kardia
Poi.Description:
​Kali Kardia is the first restaurant in Mastihari and one of the first in the island of Kos!
The building was build in 1925 and since 1955 operates as a restaurant. You can find there traditional cuisine and fresh fish.

Poi.Name: Georgakopoulos Grigorios
Poi.Description: ​

Poi.Name: Kiaris Charalabos
Poi.Description: ​

Poi.Name: Guitar resital by Moustafa Paizanoglou
Poi.Description: "Five centuries of Spanish Music and Latin American Music of the 20th Century". Guitar resital by Moustafa Paizanoglou

Poi.Name: ​​Carmen - George Bizet
Poi.Description: ​​Carmen - George Bizet The Metropolitan opera of New York/ Ant1 Heavean Group ​

Poi.Name: Tribute to K.P. Kavafis
Poi.Description: ​Tribute to K.P. Kavafis​. Cultural Associasion of Ano Syros.​

Poi.Name: ​​Women's Basketball Tournament
Poi.Description: ​​​Women's Basketball Tournament​. "Hippocrates" Athletic Association

Poi.Name: ​Summer Celebration and Painting Exhibition - Manos Pyrovolakis in Concert.
Poi.Description: ​Summer Celebration and Painting Exhibition - Manos Pyrovolakis in Concert. "Proodos" Antimachia Associasion.

Poi.Name: ​"Touring the Beauties of Kos"
Poi.Description: ​"Touring the Beauties of Kos" Photo Excibition, by "Hippocrates" Kos Association in Athens.

Poi.Name: Footvoley Tournament
Poi.Description: ​Footvoley Tournament.

Poi.Name: Live Art Festival
Poi.Description: ​​Live Art Festival​. Admission 3Euro

Poi.Name: Michalis Chatzigiannis in Concert
Poi.Description: ​Michalis Chatzigiannis in Concert​. "Hippocrates" athletic association

Poi.Name: ​Evening Service - festivities in honor of the Transiguration of Christ our Saviour.
Poi.Description: ​Evening Service - festivities in honor of the Transiguration of Christ our Saviour.

Poi.Name: Theatrical performance by "Forms of Expression", by Thomas Kindynis.
Poi.Description: ​"An enemy of the people"  - theatrical performance by "Forms of Expression", by Thomas Kindynis.
